onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Fulfilment of the Great Plan depends upon your control of the Southlands, ferocious lord. Expand your realm, conquer the warmbloods, and bring the designs of the Old Ones to fruition!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Amongst all the sea-going weapons of the world, none are so feared as the floating fortresses of the Druchii. Perform a sacrifice to Mathlann, God of the Sea, and a dreaded Black Ark will be made available to support your forces abroad.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dynasties of the Tomb Kings are venerated throughout the ages. Great power may be attained through alignment with your ancestors, my lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A scheme of great and terrible destruction has been concocted by your devious engineers, my lord. Laden one with explosives and have him visit your enemy. Doom will come upon them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Recent events have sown disorder within your temple-city, mighty lord. Take steps to re-establish your will over your Lizard-kin.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dark Elves flee, my lord, yet they will doubtless return in number - be on your guard. Construct a waystone as soon as possible to begin collection of the fragments we seek. As you no doubt sense, the strength of the Vortex is fading further.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Plaques of the Old Ones must be sought, for only the wisdom of our ancient forefathers can show us the way.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Blessings of filth to you, Queek Headtaker, the Right-Claw of Clan Mors. You and your verminous ilk infest the abandoned mountain strongholds of the Dwarfs, who still fight with the Greenskins for control, seemingly unaware of your power.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I Tretch - I have snuck-sneak into Elf-thing's lands undetected! Lucky, maybe - but I take credit-glory! Yes-yes!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Skaven society is a vicious contest. The weak are consumed, and only the strongest survive to serve in arms. Recruit them now, and they will be ready to fight in the battles to come.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Many secrets lie in the hidden places of the world, o Grand Hierophant - perhaps even an end to your eternal exile? You should strike far afield, and explore the terra incognita of the New World.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The skies beyond the horizon darken, my lord – a Black Ark approaches. The Dark Elves use their mighty floating fortresses of war to support their forces abroad. Such mighty weapons must be engaged with great caution, for they bring doom on those unprepared.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your arrival at Yuatek comes not a moment too soon, great and powerful Queek. High Elves from across the seas have launched a full-scale invasion of the Southlands, and are pressing fast towards your lair!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The insidious Skaven seek to bring their terrible god into this world, mighty lord. This must not come to pass! Continue your course of action, crush the noisome ratmen, and take control of the Vortex for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The insidious Skaven seek to bring their terrible god into this world, mighty lord. This must not come to pass! Continue your course of action, crush the noisome ratmen, and take control of the Vortex for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Control of the Vortex slips from your grasp, my lord, for another is marching upon the Isle of the Dead! Stop them, before they can bend the Vortex of Caledor to their own devices!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Control of the Vortex slips from your grasp, my lord, for another is marching upon the Isle of the Dead! Stop them, before they can bend the Vortex of Caledor to their own devices!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Skrolk will bind Vortex to his will, and spread sickness across the world! All will succumb to the Plague Monks!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You, the Asrai of Athel Loren, live in harmony with the great forest you call home. Yet there are those abroad who would endanger this paradise, my lord. Wield the sublime fury of nature against your foes and protect this woodland against all that threaten it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You, the Asrai of Athel Loren, live in harmony with the great forest you call home. Yet there are those abroad who would endanger this paradise, my lord. Wield the sublime fury of nature against your foes and protect this woodland against all that threaten it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elves' desire for power has yielded them many great artefacts, items which contain power you should harvest.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Elves' desire for power has yielded them many great artefacts, items which contain power you should harvest.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Druchii invade us in number. No doubt Malekith or his twisted crone of a mother have sensed weakness in the Vortex. Their attack is blatant; they come directly for the sea gates of Lothern.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lizardmen attack, my lord! Their deranged quest to re-establish the order of their ancients would see them use the Vortex to annihilate the world. Drive them back!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lizardmen attack, my lord! Their deranged quest to re-establish the order of their ancients would see them use the Vortex to annihilate the world. Drive them back!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Let us review what destruction the warm-blooded trespassers have wrought on your territory, enlightened lord. Select the temple-city to inspect your province.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Druchii cannot be allowed to despoil the sanctity of Ulthuan. Draw your weapons, and by Asuryan's will shall we prevail!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are not alone in your fight against the insidious Druchii. Other Asur houses inhabit Ulthuan; they could be allies... or foes, if you will.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are not alone in your fight against the insidious Druchii. Other Asur houses inhabit Ulthuan; they could be allies... or foes, if you will.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Green-skinned vermin! They shall be first to feel my wrath - I shall burn their hovels and flay their worthless husks as an example to all that would trespass upon my realm!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Green-skinned vermin! They shall be first to feel my wrath - I shall burn their hovels and flay their worthless husks as an example to all that would trespass upon my realm!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Druchii are fractured, yet many still know loyalty to your rule. Others, however, do not, and need bringing to heel. If they do not bend the knee to the Witch King then they should be destroyed utterly.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Druchii are fractured, yet many still know loyalty to your rule. Others, however, do not, and need bringing to heel. If they do not bend the knee to the Witch King then they should be destroyed utterly.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Great powers the world over are mobilising for war, Prince Tyrion. The waning strength of the Vortex induces those of evil heart to fight for its control, all while the princes at court deal in gossip...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Great powers may rise and fall by a few whispered words within the court of the Phoenix King. Use your influence to sway events to your advantage, my lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Caledor has fallen to you, my lord. The hubris of the Dragon Princes has led to their ruination by your hand. Be sure to begin the search for way-fragments - the Vortex becomes more unstable with each passing day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy retreats, my prince. How like the curs to flee from the glittering hosts of the High Elves! Aenarion’s blood runs thought your veins - finish them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Much wisdom has been gained from those plaques recovered, my children, but many more are required. The search must continue, lest the warmblood plans reach fruition first.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: As the chosen of Nagash, you surely deserve a little of the power he wielded. It is time to retrieve his mighty staff, my lord, and, through you, let the world taste his wrath!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: As the chosen of Nagash, you surely deserve a little of the power he wielded. It is time to retrieve his mighty staff, my lord, and, through you, let the world taste his wrath!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: More Greenskins and Skaven dwell in the mountains to the east, sire. They pose a potential future threat, while regions further south are already occupied by the Necrarch Brotherhood, sucking dry what life there still is in the desert.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The treacherous wisdom of the Great Betrayer must be sought if the Black Pyramid is to be opened. Begin your search at once, adherents, for the tomes of the Usurper will be scattered far and wide.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The treacherous wisdom of the Great Betrayer must be sought if the Black Pyramid is to be opened. Begin your search at once, adherents, for the tomes of the Usurper will be scattered far and wide.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Great Vortex is under attack, my lord. The Winds of Magic shriek and eddy about it in strange formations for a mighty ritual is underway in some distant land. The power of the ritual pulls and distorts the Vortex, yet there remains a chance to intervene.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Master, hear me. The world is in turmoil, unstable with its power ours to take. Yet others look to prevent me from returning you to this world.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Master, hear me. The world is in turmoil, unstable with its power ours to take. Yet others look to prevent me from returning you to this world.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A rival warlord makes false claims about his greatness in comparison to your own, mighty lord! Perhaps a conquest is in order, the better to remind your kin of the awesome power of Queek!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A rival warlord makes false claims about his greatness in comparison to your own, mighty lord! Perhaps a conquest is in order, the better to remind your kin of the awesome power of Queek!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, sire, savage Greenskins threaten to raid your lands. They defile your mortuary shrines – vengeance must be taken!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are Settra the Imperishable and all shall obey your rule!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Squirt musk of fear, vermin, for the Headtaker comes before you! I has mission from Council itself! That how important I am-am!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Sire… Witch King, Lord of the Druchii. I know to you, I am a fleeting thing - a man, a mortal - but you have received the vision. I humbly attest my advice is worthy of your majesty.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The insufferable Elves of this wasteland see fit to make war upon me. In Settra’s name, I shall have my legions march and choke their fortresses in sand. None shall stand against the Mortuary Cult!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My torturers report that the rats have made their audacious attacks on Druchii lands purely to hold them while they loot the artefacts they seek. I shall enjoy prying their twitching, dead hands away from the treasures they steal from me. We attack, now!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elves of Ulthuan fancy themselves the noble guardians of this world, upholding it against the ‘lesser races’. Yet in their hubris they fail to see that their star is waning, eclipsed by those they think beneath them - such is their arrogance!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your kind are known for its backstabbing ways, mighty lord. Yet there remain some hapless fools abroad that will be lured by your honeyed chitterings. Agree a pact of non-aggression, and begin sharpening your knife for when the time comes to break it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Rat Ogres, my lord! Hurry them into battle, for they are sorely needed!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A Hero has enrolled in your service, my lord. Be sure to put them to work - their unique skills may solve problems that no amount of money or effort would otherwise be able to crack.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A Hero has enrolled in your service, my lord. Be sure to put them to work - their unique skills may solve problems that no amount of money or effort would otherwise be able to crack.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy were not prepared for your arrival, my king; now is the perfect time to attack! Select your army first.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy were not prepared for your arrival, my king; now is the perfect time to attack! Select your army first.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your cold-blooded kind are the true guardians of the world, ancient lord. Yet the younger races care little for the designs of the Old Ones. Deploy your ferocious warriors and wield your most potent sorcery – you shall impose the order you seek!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your cold-blooded kind are the true guardians of the world, ancient lord. Yet the younger races care little for the designs of the Old Ones. Deploy your ferocious warriors and wield your most potent sorcery – you shall impose the order you seek!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Battle is upon you, mighty Witch King! Your Elves are vicious and deadly, but the Skaven have a death frenzy upon them and will offer you no quarter. Prepare your forces for murderous bloodshed!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Battle is upon you, mighty Witch King! Your Elves are vicious and deadly, but the Skaven have a death frenzy upon them and will offer you no quarter. Prepare your forces for murderous bloodshed!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Possession of the Circlet of Iron is key in gaining control of the Vortex, your Majesty. But it must be imbued with ancient power. The hags of Ghrond might be willing to divine the location of such a crux, should you meet their price.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Possession of the Circlet of Iron is key in gaining control of the Vortex, your Majesty. But it must be imbued with ancient power. The hags of Ghrond might be willing to divine the location of such a crux, should you meet their price.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The remnants of long-abandoned cities may yet yield uncovered treasure. Send armed forces to search such ruins, my lord, and great riches may be yours.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The remnants of long-abandoned cities may yet yield uncovered treasure. Send armed forces to search such ruins, my lord, and great riches may be yours.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dragon with Two Tails brings great turmoil upon the world, my children. Its wake disrupts the Great Vortex - the heart of Ulthuan is exposed!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Dragon with Two Tails brings great turmoil upon the world, my children. Its wake disrupts the Great Vortex - the heart of Ulthuan is exposed!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It is a hostile place, Tretch. Grow Clan Rictus, spread and harvest Warpstone before the enemy know you are here.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It is a hostile place, Tretch. Grow Clan Rictus, spread and harvest Warpstone before the enemy know you are here.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though your rapid return brings some welcome additional forces, the situation remains grim. See for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though your rapid return brings some welcome additional forces, the situation remains grim. See for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Druchii seek to hold our cities while they pick them clean of arcane relics and scrolls. The puppets of the Witch King must be driven out and the treasures they have taken reclaimed, before they are put to evil use.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Druchii seek to hold our cities while they pick them clean of arcane relics and scrolls. The puppets of the Witch King must be driven out and the treasures they have taken reclaimed, before they are put to evil use.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You, the Druchii of Naggaroth, bring slaughter and cruelty on the lesser races in the name of your Dark God of Bloodshed. Master the arts of sorcery and savagery that come so easily to your merciless kin, and all the world shall be your prize!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You, the Druchii of Naggaroth, bring slaughter and cruelty on the lesser races in the name of your Dark God of Bloodshed. Master the arts of sorcery and savagery that come so easily to your merciless kin, and all the world shall be your prize!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The time is right to move on the forge, yet be sure to prepare your invasion forces thoroughly - the Elves will fiercely resist a strike against so sacred a site.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The time is right to move on the forge, yet be sure to prepare your invasion forces thoroughly - the Elves will fiercely resist a strike against so sacred a site.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warriors may perish, yet their spirits are eternally bound to your service. From the Realm of Souls, the power of those that have fallen in battle continues to assist those that remain.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warriors may perish, yet their spirits are eternally bound to your service. From the Realm of Souls, the power of those that have fallen in battle continues to assist those that remain.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Skeggi flee before your awesome bulk, Lord Mazdamundi! It only remains to decide the fate of those captured in battle.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Skeggi flee before your awesome bulk, Lord Mazdamundi! It only remains to decide the fate of those captured in battle.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The taint of Undeath festers in this place, my lord. Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers, or they may turn against you to serve a new master…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The taint of Undeath festers in this place, my lord. Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers, or they may turn against you to serve a new master…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Such turmoil brings opportunity, yet it seems, my son is not alone in seeking to bend the Vortex to his will.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Such turmoil brings opportunity, yet it seems, my son is not alone in seeking to bend the Vortex to his will.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your clan is the dark menace that lurks unseen, Warlord. You are masters of concealment and deception, and the oblivious fools that dwell above ground shall all come to know of your power in time!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your clan is the dark menace that lurks unseen, Warlord. You are masters of concealment and deception, and the oblivious fools that dwell above ground shall all come to know of your power in time!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Lustria has ever been a trove of forgotten lore. Yet its reptilian guardians jealously hoard such knowledge and rarely welcome trespassers.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Lustria has ever been a trove of forgotten lore. Yet its reptilian guardians jealously hoard such knowledge and rarely welcome trespassers.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Rat-spawn hoard plaques wrenched from ancient temples. Lord Mazdamundi bids us to strike. Recover sacred artefacts and discover enemy trespasser schemes.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Rat-spawn hoard plaques wrenched from ancient temples. Lord Mazdamundi bids us to strike. Recover sacred artefacts and discover enemy trespasser schemes.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Grave news, my lord, for a traitor in your midst has turned against you. A subordinate has broken away from your rule, and has convinced a portion of your armed forces into following them. Such flagrant treachery cannot go unanswered: muster your forces, and crush them utterly!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Grave news, my lord, for a traitor in your midst has turned against you. A subordinate has broken away from your rule, and has convinced a portion of your armed forces into following them. Such flagrant treachery cannot go unanswered: muster your forces, and crush them utterly!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beyond the northern watchtowers lurk the savage tribes of men, petty worshippers of the Dark Powers. Their ceaseless attacks upon your realm must end with their annihilation.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Beyond the northern watchtowers lurk the savage tribes of men, petty worshippers of the Dark Powers. Their ceaseless attacks upon your realm must end with their annihilation.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Queen Khalida, let the power of Asaph envelop you - bring justice to all and vengeance to your enemies!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Queen Khalida, let the power of Asaph envelop you - bring justice to all and vengeance to your enemies!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Savage Greenskins threaten to raid my lands in the east. They have defiled my temples before, I shall ensure their extinction!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Savage Greenskins threaten to raid my lands in the east. They have defiled my temples before, I shall ensure their extinction!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: That's it! The necessary way-fragments are secured, and I sense that Loremaster Talarian stands ready to commence the ritual. Let us begin…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: That's it! The necessary way-fragments are secured, and I sense that Loremaster Talarian stands ready to commence the ritual. Let us begin…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Warpstone found in old ruins, reptiles not get there yet-yet! Search ancient places, my brood - find Warpstone, claim it for Pestilens!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Warpstone found in old ruins, reptiles not get there yet-yet! Search ancient places, my brood - find Warpstone, claim it for Pestilens!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A fifth tome has been secured, my adherents. The great power of the Lord of Undeath courses through me; our return to Nehekhara is at hand. Come, adherents - the Black Pyramid lies open!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A fifth tome has been secured, my adherents. The great power of the Lord of Undeath courses through me; our return to Nehekhara is at hand. Come, adherents - the Black Pyramid lies open!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Defeat, my lord! The Vortex slips from our grasp! Let us retreat and regroup!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Defeat, my lord! The Vortex slips from our grasp! Let us retreat and regroup!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elf-things not suspect of-of rats on Naggaroth, ha-ha! No-furs build their things where Warpstone lies buried-hidden! Take-capture no-fur cities! Smash them down! Claim Warpstone for me!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Elf-things not suspect of-of rats on Naggaroth, ha-ha! No-furs build their things where Warpstone lies buried-hidden! Take-capture no-fur cities! Smash them down! Claim Warpstone for me!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: In the meantime, you should unify the Druchii, through either statecraft or by destroying would-be opposition. All will bow to the Witch King; all will yield to Malekith!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: In the meantime, you should unify the Druchii, through either statecraft or by destroying would-be opposition. All will bow to the Witch King; all will yield to Malekith!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Ghrond has fallen, my lord - the depraved followers of the Hag Sorceress now bend their knee to you. Nevertheless, be wary of a counter-attack. Be sure to erect a shrine as soon as can be, in order to gain the scrolls you seek.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Ghrond has fallen, my lord - the depraved followers of the Hag Sorceress now bend their knee to you. Nevertheless, be wary of a counter-attack. Be sure to erect a shrine as soon as can be, in order to gain the scrolls you seek.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The hills and valleys of this place conceal the enemy's whereabouts, my lord. This hilltop should afford a good view over the surrounding area.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The hills and valleys of this place conceal the enemy's whereabouts, my lord. This hilltop should afford a good view over the surrounding area.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Skrolk! Harbinger of Pestilens! You do not need eyes to know you are deep within Lustria - your Plague Monks have infested the very heart of the Lizardmen lands.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Skrolk! Harbinger of Pestilens! You do not need eyes to know you are deep within Lustria - your Plague Monks have infested the very heart of the Lizardmen lands.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beyond the jungles lie the barren deserts of the dead. You will find no allies here, and the mountains are not hospitable to your kind. Yet they will need to be crossed if you are to join your Geomantic strands to the nodes in Lustria.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Beyond the jungles lie the barren deserts of the dead. You will find no allies here, and the mountains are not hospitable to your kind. Yet they will need to be crossed if you are to join your Geomantic strands to the nodes in Lustria.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elf-things that march against us-us shall pay-pay! Eshin Spies say-say pointy-eared no-furs steal Queek’s treasures - we take-take them back! All things are Queek's!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Elf-things that march against us-us shall pay-pay! Eshin Spies say-say pointy-eared no-furs steal Queek’s treasures - we take-take them back! All things are Queek's!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Sons of Ulthuan - pupils of Hoeth - we do not come upon this place lightly. The world is in dire peril, and it falls to us once more to save it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Sons of Ulthuan - pupils of Hoeth - we do not come upon this place lightly. The world is in dire peril, and it falls to us once more to save it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your occupation forces gain control over new lands, my lord. Further conquest in this province will grant you complete dominion over those that exist there.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your occupation forces gain control over new lands, my lord. Further conquest in this province will grant you complete dominion over those that exist there.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You need not fight your enemies alone, my lord, for there are foreign powers sympathetic to your cause. Agreeing a pact of non-aggression with a foreign leader will do much to build trust between you. Trade relations or a military alliance may follow.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You need not fight your enemies alone, my lord, for there are foreign powers sympathetic to your cause. Agreeing a pact of non-aggression with a foreign leader will do much to build trust between you. Trade relations or a military alliance may follow.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: But they are all mere distractions, I hunger for more; the power of the Black Pyramid! It stands, guarded by a sentinel army, and behind magical bonds that can only be unravelled by owning Books of Nagash.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: But they are all mere distractions, I hunger for more; the power of the Black Pyramid! It stands, guarded by a sentinel army, and behind magical bonds that can only be unravelled by owning Books of Nagash.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I yearn to journey back to Khemri, past the bestial hordes that war with us and across the cold mountains harbouring a dark, chaotic magic - as unsubtle as it is destructive.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I yearn to journey back to Khemri, past the bestial hordes that war with us and across the cold mountains harbouring a dark, chaotic magic - as unsubtle as it is destructive.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The armies of the world march upon the ritual site, my lord, for there is still time to prevent its fulfilment. If you cannot intervene in time, however, there may be the opportunity to hire more local forces to strike on your behalf.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The armies of the world march upon the ritual site, my lord, for there is still time to prevent its fulfilment. If you cannot intervene in time, however, there may be the opportunity to hire more local forces to strike on your behalf.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The trespassers flee. They are warmbloods - it is to be expected. Finish them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The trespassers flee. They are warmbloods - it is to be expected. Finish them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy are in retreat, mighty lord! The power of the Vortex is in your hands! Use it wisely, for others who seek to control the Vortex converge upon your position!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy are in retreat, mighty lord! The power of the Vortex is in your hands! Use it wisely, for others who seek to control the Vortex converge upon your position!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It would seem that your achievements have gained you recognition with the Council of Thirteen, my lord, for they have requested that you build your forces for a purpose as yet unknown. Yet be wary, for you have many rivals who would sooner see you sent to your death than gain further glory.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It would seem that your achievements have gained you recognition with the Council of Thirteen, my lord, for they have requested that you build your forces for a purpose as yet unknown. Yet be wary, for you have many rivals who would sooner see you sent to your death than gain further glory.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My spies report that Felicion requires the power of many scrolls in order to fulfil her ritual. Such artefacts can still be found, buried, within ancient sites of power. We must unearth them while our treacherous foes remain ignorant of their existence.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My spies report that Felicion requires the power of many scrolls in order to fulfil her ritual. Such artefacts can still be found, buried, within ancient sites of power. We must unearth them while our treacherous foes remain ignorant of their existence.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Marauders of Chaos also roam these lands, often hidden in the fierce ice-shard storms.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Marauders of Chaos also roam these lands, often hidden in the fierce ice-shard storms.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Always survey the terrain prior to battle and position your troops to gain an edge. The enemy gave battle so the onus is on them to attack. Use this to your advantage!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Always survey the terrain prior to battle and position your troops to gain an edge. The enemy gave battle so the onus is on them to attack. Use this to your advantage!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It is within Canopic Jars that the remains of the dead are preserved, and to which their souls are eternally bound. Seek out more such artefacts, for the essences they provide can prove useful.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It is within Canopic Jars that the remains of the dead are preserved, and to which their souls are eternally bound. Seek out more such artefacts, for the essences they provide can prove useful.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy draw close, my lord! Be sure to have your troops arranged for battle. Employ all that you have learned; wear them down with missiles, pin them with infantry, then hit them in the flanks!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy draw close, my lord! Be sure to have your troops arranged for battle. Employ all that you have learned; wear them down with missiles, pin them with infantry, then hit them in the flanks!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your mighty Tomb Blade lies dormant, my lord. It requires a powerful soul to feed its hunger, and become an instrument of true power. Perhaps it is time to seek a suitable ‘donor’ for the task…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your mighty Tomb Blade lies dormant, my lord. It requires a powerful soul to feed its hunger, and become an instrument of true power. Perhaps it is time to seek a suitable ‘donor’ for the task…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Put your Skinks to work on improving your methods of warfare, my lord. For this task they will need even grander edifices.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Put your Skinks to work on improving your methods of warfare, my lord. For this task they will need even grander edifices.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: For too long have the petty warlords of Naggaroth been allowed to defy your will, dark Sorceress. The time is now to remind them, and the world beyond your shores, of the awesome power you wield!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: For too long have the petty warlords of Naggaroth been allowed to defy your will, dark Sorceress. The time is now to remind them, and the world beyond your shores, of the awesome power you wield!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your arrival has caught the 'Elf-things' by surprise, Lord Queek! Now is the perfect time to attack. Select your army first.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your arrival has caught the 'Elf-things' by surprise, Lord Queek! Now is the perfect time to attack. Select your army first.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The cold-blooded beasts of the Lustrian jungles draw near. Be wary of the Lizardmen, my lord, their motives are often hard to fathom, but the ferocity of their warriors and the sharpness of their claws are in little doubt.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The cold-blooded beasts of the Lustrian jungles draw near. Be wary of the Lizardmen, my lord, their motives are often hard to fathom, but the ferocity of their warriors and the sharpness of their claws are in little doubt.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Relations abroad have blossomed since agreeing a pact of non-aggression, my lord. A trade agreement may now be possible. Let your merchants flourish, for industry drives war.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Relations abroad have blossomed since agreeing a pact of non-aggression, my lord. A trade agreement may now be possible. Let your merchants flourish, for industry drives war.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beware, my lord, for the Skaven infest these ruins! Legends told of mighty burrows hollowed out by the ratmen beneath ruined cities - it now seems that these legends were true!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Beware, my lord, for the Skaven infest these ruins! Legends told of mighty burrows hollowed out by the ratmen beneath ruined cities - it now seems that these legends were true!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Old Ones shaped this world, and for too long have their designs been ignored. Their Great Plan must be fulfilled, Lord Mazdamundi, no matter the cost!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Old Ones shaped this world, and for too long have their designs been ignored. Their Great Plan must be fulfilled, Lord Mazdamundi, no matter the cost!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I travel far from my throne, not merely to end you, creature, but for the Books of Nagash. The knowledge they contain will grant me strength over Neferata!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I travel far from my throne, not merely to end you, creature, but for the Books of Nagash. The knowledge they contain will grant me strength over Neferata!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: See how the enemy scurries away from your might! Show them no mercy, prince of rats - finish them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: See how the enemy scurries away from your might! Show them no mercy, prince of rats - finish them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: On the periphery, the treacherous wastes herald a sandstorm of the Undead. They may become a nuisance, but how you deal with them is for you to decide.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: On the periphery, the treacherous wastes herald a sandstorm of the Undead. They may become a nuisance, but how you deal with them is for you to decide.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: One of your followers has gained experience and their skills may now be developed accordingly. See for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: One of your followers has gained experience and their skills may now be developed accordingly. See for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Naggarond looms, sending constant threats against Ulthuan. Even now, they establish footholds within sacred lands. Others of your kind will surely fight back, but can they be trusted to succeed?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Naggarond looms, sending constant threats against Ulthuan. Even now, they establish footholds within sacred lands. Others of your kind will surely fight back, but can they be trusted to succeed?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A plague has come upon your kind, my lord! Such a virulent outbreak I have never witnessed… Consider isolating those struck down until the disease runs its course. Contact with the unfortunate sufferers will inevitably risk the contagion spreading.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A plague has come upon your kind, my lord! Such a virulent outbreak I have never witnessed… Consider isolating those struck down until the disease runs its course. Contact with the unfortunate sufferers will inevitably risk the contagion spreading.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy retreats. How typical of the weaklings. Not that I need to tell a Druchii this, but show them no mercy – finish them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy retreats. How typical of the weaklings. Not that I need to tell a Druchii this, but show them no mercy – finish them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Arch-Plaguelord Nurglitch, supreme ruler of Clan Pestilens, has decreed that the strength of the Clan must grow, my lord. Yet we cannot merely breed our way out of this! You must ignite the power within the Rod of Corruption.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Arch-Plaguelord Nurglitch, supreme ruler of Clan Pestilens, has decreed that the strength of the Clan must grow, my lord. Yet we cannot merely breed our way out of this! You must ignite the power within the Rod of Corruption.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: We have secured a number of way-fragments in preparation for Loremaster Talarian's ritual, yet more are required. We must act in all haste; it is clear that Malekith's minions are gathering scrolls of lore for their own fell rites. Time is of the essence!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: We have secured a number of way-fragments in preparation for Loremaster Talarian's ritual, yet more are required. We must act in all haste; it is clear that Malekith's minions are gathering scrolls of lore for their own fell rites. Time is of the essence!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Invocations of great potency may be performed by your most potent wielders of magic, mighty lord. Summon them together, and they may perform rites to grant you considerable powers - albeit at a price.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Invocations of great potency may be performed by your most potent wielders of magic, mighty lord. Summon them together, and they may perform rites to grant you considerable powers - albeit at a price.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A tome of the Great Betrayer has been found. Its power bends to my will! Go forth, slaves, and continue the search!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A tome of the Great Betrayer has been found. Its power bends to my will! Go forth, slaves, and continue the search!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your kind burns energy - blessed, or perhaps cursed with a high metabolism - they will not fight on an empty stomach. Be sure to keep your forces fed, lest they chitter and conspire to turn on their commanders as a source of nourishment!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: With such a force behind you, search out your master's fabled books throughout the world. They are artefacts of immense power and are the key to the Black Pyramid and the Great Necromancer's return.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Mirror Pool of Tepok shimmers with undiscovered secrets, mighty lord. The plaques you seek may surely be found there in great number.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Ancient power flows through the ruins of Lustria - I can sense it. Let us seek out way-fragments in these places. They will be needed if Loremaster Talarian is to set right the Winds of Magic.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Relations abroad have blossomed since agreeing a pact of non-aggression, my prince. A trade agreement may now be possible. Furthermore, your kind are known for their skill in placing informants in markets across the world. Let commerce be your eyes and ears.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The seat of the Phoenix King must not fall! Finubar has entrusted me to lead the counter-attack. Join my cause, brave Asur, and together we shall overcome!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Even those surface-dwellers who have heard tales of the Skaven Under-Empire regard them as little more than myths. advice_levels.onscreen_text: The pestilent warmbloods are driven from the shrine, mighty lord. The search for plaques may commence there once suitable facilities are constructed. Make all haste - you no doubt sense the decline of the Vortex for yourself.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Skrolk has succeeded, my brood, the Warpstone is secure! Now-now, the ritual may begin!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Skrolk has succeeded, my brood, the Warpstone is secure! Now-now, the ritual may begin!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Even now they march upon your burrows in Yuatek. Skaven control of the Southlands rests upon you holding this warren. Lord Gnawdwell will not look kindly on us if Clan Mors lose this lair!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Even now they march upon your burrows in Yuatek. Skaven control of the Southlands rests upon you holding this warren. Lord Gnawdwell will not look kindly on us if Clan Mors lose this lair!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I advise you to seek ways to further your methods of war, my lord. Put your best minds to work improving your knowledge and practices.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Reports are coming in of a living expeditionary force close to your territory, my lord. Such a threat cannot be tolerated. Show them that you are master of these lands once again!!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Reports are coming in of a living expeditionary force close to your territory, my lord. Such a threat cannot be tolerated. Show them that you are master of these lands once again!!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The grobi maintain one of their slum camps beneath the Pillars of Grungni - a sin that cannot remain in the Dammaz Kron any longer! The pillars must be returned to Dwarfen hands.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The grobi maintain one of their slum camps beneath the Pillars of Grungni - a sin that cannot remain in the Dammaz Kron any longer! The pillars must be returned to Dwarfen hands.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Karaz-a-Karak is secure, my lord High King. Faced with your terrible wrath, the Greenskins rout - as is typical of their craven nature.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Karaz-a-Karak is secure, my lord High King. Faced with your terrible wrath, the Greenskins rout - as is typical of their craven nature.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east, setting up their hovels amidst your sacred pillars. Another grudge that must be put right... And soon, for the lords of the other Dwarfholds will not tolerate a High King that cannot secure his own realms.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east, setting up their hovels amidst your sacred pillars. Another grudge that must be put right... And soon, for the lords of the other Dwarfholds will not tolerate a High King that cannot secure his own realms.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, yet more vicious urki and grobi lay ready to strike at your kin. Seek allies amongst your own folk, for there are many grudges to settle here.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the south, yet more vicious urki and grobi lay ready to strike at your kin. Seek allies amongst your own folk, for there are many grudges to settle here.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The world shall be in thrall to the Karaz-Ankor once more, and no creature, Greenskin or otherwise, shall stand in your way!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The world shall be in thrall to the Karaz-Ankor once more, and no creature, Greenskin or otherwise, shall stand in your way!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Gyrocopter scouts report of a Greenskin migration heading northwards. Spies say they intend to meet up and swell the mobs of a dread Orc Warlord who travels towards the Badlands. Whatever they are up to, they must be stopped - summon the throng!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Gyrocopter scouts report of a Greenskin migration heading northwards. Spies say they intend to meet up and swell the mobs of a dread Orc Warlord who travels towards the Badlands. Whatever they are up to, they must be stopped - summon the throng!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Greenskin threat is extinguished, Sire, yet the fight to secure your rule has only just begun.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Greenskin threat is extinguished, Sire, yet the fight to secure your rule has only just begun.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Empire is beset by civil war once more. Secessionists hostile to your election as Emperor are trying to form a breakaway province to the south. Advance, crush them, and bring the lands back to your sovereign rule.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Empire is beset by civil war once more. Secessionists hostile to your election as Emperor are trying to form a breakaway province to the south. Advance, crush them, and bring the lands back to your sovereign rule.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, Boris Todbringer of Middenheim - a bitter rival in the recent election – is openly hostile. A clash with Todbringer and the wolves of Middenland may well be unavoidable if you wish to unify the Empire. Plan for this eventuality.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, Boris Todbringer of Middenheim - a bitter rival in the recent election – is openly hostile. A clash with Todbringer and the wolves of Middenland may well be unavoidable if you wish to unify the Empire. Plan for this eventuality.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Empire has ever been besieged by foes, but you are a prince of Altdorf - greatness runs in your very blood! Make the Heldenhammer proud!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Empire has ever been besieged by foes, but you are a prince of Altdorf - greatness runs in your very blood! Make the Heldenhammer proud!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It is important to act quickly if you have any intention of securing lasting authority over the Empire. The people must learn that open dissent cannot be tolerated. Capture Grunburg, and snuff out the resistance there.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It is important to act quickly if you have any intention of securing lasting authority over the Empire. The people must learn that open dissent cannot be tolerated. Capture Grunburg, and snuff out the resistance there.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your army suffers in the miserable conditions they find themselves, my lord. Move them on, or more warriors will fall to the elements.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army suffers in the miserable conditions they find themselves, my lord. Move them on, or more warriors will fall to the elements.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your army has wandered into the Chaos Wastes! This is no place for your kind - withdraw them with all haste!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army has wandered into the Chaos Wastes! This is no place for your kind - withdraw them with all haste!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The denizens are dangerously agitated, my lord! Soon they will take up arms against you. Move swiftly to crush or appease them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The denizens are dangerously agitated, my lord! Soon they will take up arms against you. Move swiftly to crush or appease them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your foolish subjects here have taken up arms against your rule, my lord! Move against their uprising, or it may grow to threaten your grip on this place!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your foolish subjects here have taken up arms against your rule, my lord! Move against their uprising, or it may grow to threaten your grip on this place!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A taint of Chaos festers in this place. Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers, or they may turn against you to serve a new master...

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A taint of Chaos festers in this place. Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers, or they may turn against you to serve a new master...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your expenditure is exceeding your income, my lord. Be mindful of your treasury, and try to solve any deficit before you run out of funds entirely.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your expenditure is exceeding your income, my lord. Be mindful of your treasury, and try to solve any deficit before you run out of funds entirely.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Commerce! The life-blood of every nation, even more important than war for some. A trade agreement is being offered by a rival power. Such a deal would foster trust as well as generate income, but you must decide if it's the right thing to do.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Commerce! The life-blood of every nation, even more important than war for some. A trade agreement is being offered by a rival power. Such a deal would foster trust as well as generate income, but you must decide if it's the right thing to do.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A trade agreement may be possible with the rulers of this place, my lord; a rich nation is a powerful one. Let your traders, merchants and Guilds flourish, for industry creates war...

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A trade agreement may be possible with the rulers of this place, my lord; a rich nation is a powerful one. Let your traders, merchants and Guilds flourish, for industry creates war...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your treasury is running dry, my lord. Soon you will be out of coin. Take action now to mitigate the threat of bankruptcy.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your treasury is running dry, my lord. Soon you will be out of coin. Take action now to mitigate the threat of bankruptcy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The treasury is bare! Bankruptcy is upon you. Take all action necessary to restore a positive income, or your power and influence will quickly unravel!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The treasury is bare! Bankruptcy is upon you. Take all action necessary to restore a positive income, or your power and influence will quickly unravel!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Emissaries from a foreign ruler are seeking a pact of non-aggression. Such an agreement will foster trust between your followers. Trade relations or an alliance may follow.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Emissaries from a foreign ruler are seeking a pact of non-aggression. Such an agreement will foster trust between your followers. Trade relations or an alliance may follow.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Such an action would surely lead to war! As glorious as that is, proceed only if you desire conflict, my lord.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Such an action would surely lead to war! As glorious as that is, proceed only if you desire conflict, my lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Ruinous Powers have been sighted nearby! The forces of Chaos wish to bring about the End Times. Beat them down at every opportunity.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Ruinous Powers have been sighted nearby! The forces of Chaos wish to bring about the End Times. Beat them down at every opportunity.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A horde has been observed nearby, my lord. They march with their whole civilisation in tow. Drive them away if they attempt to scour your lands!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A horde has been observed nearby, my lord. They march with their whole civilisation in tow. Drive them away if they attempt to scour your lands!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Unification with the rulers of this place might be a possibility, my lord. Together you would march under the same banner, and your warriors would become as one. Consider making this request.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Grave news, my lord. Some of your forces have mutinied against your rule: civil war is upon you! They must be crushed, without question - and quickly - else your greater goals will be set back.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Grave news, my lord. Some of your forces have mutinied against your rule: civil war is upon you! They must be crushed, without question - and quickly - else your greater goals will be set back.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Titles are being left vacant, Sire, while suitable candidates are ready for promotion. Be sure to examine the available lords for advancement.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Titles are being left vacant, Sire, while suitable candidates are ready for promotion. Be sure to examine the available lords for advancement.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The wars to come will be fought using guile as well as brawn. Consider recruiting a Hero to expand the range of military options at your disposal. Heroes can be hired to support your forces, or to strike against the enemy.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The wars to come will be fought using guile as well as brawn. Consider recruiting a Hero to expand the range of military options at your disposal. Heroes can be hired to support your forces, or to strike against the enemy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: That is a Hero serving a foreign power, my lord. Consider recruiting such an operative into your service. One being with the right skills can solve problems that no amount of coin or labour would otherwise be able to crack.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: That is a Hero serving a foreign power, my lord. Consider recruiting such an operative into your service. One being with the right skills can solve problems that no amount of coin or labour would otherwise be able to crack.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Sabotage, my lord! An enemy power has sent a Hero to disrupt the running of your domain. This act of aggression cannot be left unanswered.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Sabotage, my lord! An enemy power has sent a Hero to disrupt the running of your domain. This act of aggression cannot be left unanswered.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Victory is yours, my lord! But what about the fate of those captured in battle? It can be beneficial to hold them, but sometimes leniency or brutality can be worth more.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Victory is yours, my lord! But what about the fate of those captured in battle? It can be beneficial to hold them, but sometimes leniency or brutality can be worth more.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: At last, the defences have fallen, my lord. The fate of those that remain is yours to determine.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your forces begin their attack, my lord! See for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your forces begin their attack, my lord! See for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to join the fight yourself. The warriors will be greatly inspired by your presence.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to join the fight yourself. The warriors will be greatly inspired by your presence.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Knowledge of your own strengths is vital if any conquest is to succeed. Your kind are wild and barbarous, my lord. Success will never be won around the table, but on the battlefield.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The boyz' clamour for battle grows with each victory. The fervour of your kind can be a powerful force if harnessed, but an Orc's lust for blood - if left unsated - can be his undoing.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: More Greenskins muster in the mountain pass to the east. Attack now, while they remain vulnerable.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I know your patience wears thin, my king, but you must temper the need for vengeance with further intelligence of the grobi's actions. There is nothing more to do for now.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The grumblings of Dwarfs never cease! Some that remain in Karaz-a-Karak have the nerve to make trouble in your absence, my king. Take steps to re-assert control over your mountain.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: As you know all too well, the power of the Dawi has reverberated through these mountains for millennia. Harness that strength, and you will have all you need to restore the Karaz Ankor to its former glory.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to make use of the Underway when moving your folk around the mountains, Sire. Much time can be saved when travelling below ground.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Despite your recent victories, there are rabble-rousers within Altdorf that agitate against the rightful rule of the Emperor. Take steps to quell the unrest.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A vigil on expenditure must be maintained for your domain to prosper. Be sure to keep a close watch on your finances, lest ruin overtakes you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have slumbered long, Shaggoth. Arise, mighty Kholek - it is time to bring ruin to the earthly realms!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have slumbered long, Shaggoth. Arise, mighty Kholek - it is time to bring ruin to the earthly realms!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your adopted father calls you, Sigvald. The Dark Prince desires destruction and perversion of the world. Let it begin!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Age of Reckoning has begun, Slayer King. You are no stranger to oaths, Ungrim, so swear that the Karaz Ankor will be great again!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your territory expands, savage lord, yet there are many lands to conquer. In time, I foresee war with the greater tribes of the Badlands, as well as the stunted kind that dwell beneath the mountains. Keep your axe sharp, for Mork and Gork watch your progress with interest!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your burgeoning realm grows, your eminence, yet many evils still abound in this world. The Empire remains divided, and marauding Greenskins still threaten your lands. Further afield, there are rumours of a dark force rising in the east, spreading the taint of Undeath. You must remain vigilant.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The taint of Undeath is spread by your conquests, mighty lord. Your realm grows, and more distant lands now fall under your gaze. The Empire and other kingdoms of men lie to the north and west: there you may feast, for the living are plentiful.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The taint of Undeath is spread by your conquests, mighty lord. Your realm grows, and more distant lands now fall under your gaze. The Empire and other kingdoms of men lie to the north and west: there you may feast, for the living are plentiful.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Dawi have been put to work fixing up the captured city, Sire. Yet there are many grudges still to settle. Perfidious Manlings and bloodthirsty Vampires threaten your kind in the north, and your mountain will never be safe while a single Greenskin draws breath. To war!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Oblivion has come, my lord! Archaon the Everchosen, Lord of the End Times, has re-entered the world. With him marches a Chaos host numberless in size. Prepare yourself for the coming apocalypse!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Everchosen himself, Archaon, has been sighted. He leads a host of immeasurable power. Do not face him in battle unprepared!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The world rejoices: Archaeon is defeated! This is a great victory, yours is the glory. And yet I suspect you have not seen the last of such a mighty foe. Beware his return.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers or they may turn against you to serve a new master...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: "Tduigu-Uis" - a greeting in your tongue, my bestial lord. I know you feel a yearning to kill me, for I am but a man, but you have received the vision, you know who has sent me… my desire is as yours - to see the Cloven Ones tear down all civilisation! So let us begin...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, past the mystic forest of Athel Loren, is Bretonnia. Arrogant and aloof, its glittering spires a sure sign of self-righteousness. You should bring ruin to this "pretty" realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: East of Bretonnia lies the Empire, the very pinnacle of mankind's hubris. Its capital, Altdorf, is the centre of power and a symbol of its surety. Reduce it all to rubble - let pandemonium reign. The Empire is powerful, but divided. You must strike soon, for it may yet unify and seek to bring "civilisation" to the blood-grounds.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, in Karak Izor, the foul Belegar Ironhammer has aspirations to reclaim his ancestral home. The Eight Peaks are yours, Skarsnik - do not relent until the threat is dealt with and they are back under your control.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your enemies are belligerent and won’t necessarily cow down to your indomitable will - they need to be tamed, broken or annihilated!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your enemies are belligerent and won’t necessarily cow down to your indomitable will - they need to be tamed, broken or annihilated!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have overthrown rebellions before, and will do so again. All those who oppose you will face your rage, and then the hunger of Gobbla, of course. Destroy and devour all those who stand against you!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have overthrown rebellions before, and will do so again. All those who oppose you will face your rage, and then the hunger of Gobbla, of course. Destroy and devour all those who stand against you!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Green Godz have led you to Ekrund, Lord Wurrzag! What do they whisper now? Are the Badlands ready for the taking?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Green Godz have led you to Ekrund, Lord Wurrzag! What do they whisper now? Are the Badlands ready for the taking?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The nearby area is teeming with tribes of inferior Greenskins; to the east, the Teef Snatchaz and Red Fangs gather, eager to exploit you and regain lost lands. Yet you are chosen by the gods - they will see that you prevail.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The nearby area is teeming with tribes of inferior Greenskins; to the east, the Teef Snatchaz and Red Fangs gather, eager to exploit you and regain lost lands. Yet you are chosen by the gods - they will see that you prevail.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Demonstrate your strength to these weaklings, and tribes of lesser Orcs will flock to your banner, freeing you to pursue your twisted prophecies. The stunted Dwarfs that dwell in the mountains around you should provide plentiful quarry.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Demonstrate your strength to these weaklings, and tribes of lesser Orcs will flock to your banner, freeing you to pursue your twisted prophecies. The stunted Dwarfs that dwell in the mountains around you should provide plentiful quarry.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: There are many who will not listen to your words, who call you misguided or mad. They will be brought to heel - you have foreseen it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: There are many who will not listen to your words, who call you misguided or mad. They will be brought to heel - you have foreseen it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are the Great Green Prophet, Wurrzag. You have been promised greatness by the gods - now go and claim it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are the Great Green Prophet, Wurrzag. You have been promised greatness by the gods - now go and claim it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Druchii raiders were last sighted close to here, Prince Tyrion. Survey the area for yourself.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Druchii raiders were last sighted close to here, Prince Tyrion. Survey the area for yourself.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail to you, Grombrindal, Ancestor of legend. You have secured Karaz-a-Karak, defended it from the Greenskin fiends and put their gutless horde to rout.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hail to you, Grombrindal, Ancestor of legend. You have secured Karaz-a-Karak, defended it from the Greenskin fiends and put their gutless horde to rout.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet more remains undone - the Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east, setting up their hovels amidst your sacred pillars. Dwarfen lands lay sullied by their sickening taint! You must be the hero of the ancient sagas, and march for their deliverance.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet more remains undone - the Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east, setting up their hovels amidst your sacred pillars. Dwarfen lands lay sullied by their sickening taint! You must be the hero of the ancient sagas, and march for their deliverance.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The foul musk of vermin drifts on the air, your majesty - the Skaven are close. Survey the area for yourself.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The foul musk of vermin drifts on the air, your majesty - the Skaven are close. Survey the area for yourself.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, yet more vicious urki and grobi lay ready to strike at your kin, perhaps even the loathsome Black Goblin. Know that there are other Dwarfen Lords who would gladly ally with one so legendary as you, for common cause.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs will know a new age of prosperity, heralded by the battle cry of Grombrindal, the White Dwarf!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Dwarfs will know a new age of prosperity, heralded by the battle cry of Grombrindal, the White Dwarf!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed by the Elven Council. Here, the noble lords and ladies of Athel Loren bestow the forest's great wisdom and knowledge upon their subjects.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed here, through the Gathering of the Ancients. The Treemen Ancients bestow great wisdom and knowledge upon their realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed here, through the Gathering of the Ancients. The Treemen Ancients bestow great wisdom and knowledge upon their realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Formed from resin from the Oak of Ages' broken roots, Amber can be found across the world. If Athel Loren is to be protected from those who wish the forest harm, then as much as possible must be recovered.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Formed from resin from the Oak of Ages' broken roots, Amber can be found across the world. If Athel Loren is to be protected from those who wish the forest harm, then as much as possible must be recovered.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Amber wealth has been depleted, my lord. Now, there is a deficit - this will cause issues if the situation is left unresolved. Find more and return it to Athel Loren with haste!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Amber wealth has been depleted, my lord. Now, there is a deficit - this will cause issues if the situation is left unresolved. Find more and return it to Athel Loren with haste!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages is the source of all life in the forest. Treat it with care and it will flourish; neglect its wellbeing and leave Athel Loren wide open before the forces of destruction!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages is the source of all life in the forest. Treat it with care and it will flourish; neglect its wellbeing and leave Athel Loren wide open before the forces of destruction!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: At Athel Loren's centre, the glorious Oak of Ages blossoms into life.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: At Athel Loren's centre, the glorious Oak of Ages blossoms into life.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The mighty Oak of Ages blooms, pushing its canopy further over Athel Loren’s enchanting glades.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The mighty Oak of Ages blooms, pushing its canopy further over Athel Loren’s enchanting glades.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Magnificent, my lord! The Oak of Ages flourishes under your benevolent nurture.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Magnificent, my lord! The Oak of Ages flourishes under your benevolent nurture.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warriors rally behind your awesome presence, dread sire. Your power is such that it may carry any battle; be sure to use it wisely!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warriors rally behind your awesome presence, dread sire. Your power is such that it may carry any battle; be sure to use it wisely!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest rejoices, my lord, at the wonder that is the Oak of Ages! The Asrai know now that nothing is to be feared, and all will be as the forest intends.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forest rejoices, my lord, at the wonder that is the Oak of Ages! The Asrai know now that nothing is to be feared, and all will be as the forest intends.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Mighty halls stand tall among Athel Loren's multifarious glades. Although not protected by walls of brick and stone, intruders are kept at bay by the forest itself, extending a branch or root and dragging trespassers to a smothering, leafy doom.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Mighty halls stand tall among Athel Loren's multifarious glades. Although not protected by walls of brick and stone, intruders are kept at bay by the forest itself, extending a branch or root and dragging trespassers to a smothering, leafy doom.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your presence on the field inspires those you command, Lord Mazdamundi. Under your wise instruction, they advance against the enemy with confidence. Wield your awesome power wisely!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your presence on the field inspires those you command, Lord Mazdamundi. Under your wise instruction, they advance against the enemy with confidence. Wield your awesome power wisely!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your presence on the field brings fear and obedience in those you command, Lord Queek. Your reputation for bloodletting makes you the master of any battle you enter. Wield your awesome power wisely!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your presence on the field brings fear and obedience in those you command, Lord Queek. Your reputation for bloodletting makes you the master of any battle you enter. Wield your awesome power wisely!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The lands beyond the forest are rich and prosperous. Claim them for the Asrai and ensure their return to nature's loving, leafy embrace.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The lands beyond the forest are rich and prosperous. Claim them for the Asrai and ensure their return to nature's loving, leafy embrace.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The time has come to advance, my lord. First, select your own unit, in order to rejoin your forces.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The time has come to advance, my lord. First, select your own unit, in order to rejoin your forces.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It is time to establish your first Asrai Lookout beyond Athel Loren's woodland boughs. Establishing such outposts is vitally important, if you wish to conquer the Old World, with a precious piece of Amber your reward for each one constructed.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It is time to establish your first Asrai Lookout beyond Athel Loren's woodland boughs. Establishing such outposts is vitally important, if you wish to conquer the Old World, with a precious piece of Amber your reward for each one constructed.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Like the Worldroots before it, an Asrai Lookout has succumbed to the enemy, my lord. Alas, a piece of Amber has been lost along with it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Like the Worldroots before it, an Asrai Lookout has succumbed to the enemy, my lord. Alas, a piece of Amber has been lost along with it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! Now, issue a move order towards your army. The troops are assembled, and await your arrival.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! Now, issue a move order towards your army. The troops are assembled, and await your arrival.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Deep beneath the earth lie the Worldroots, a network of enclosed passageways that connect the great forests of the Old World. Make use of them to quickly travel through otherwise hostile terrain.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Deep beneath the earth lie the Worldroots, a network of enclosed passageways that connect the great forests of the Old World. Make use of them to quickly travel through otherwise hostile terrain.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though the invading hordes are falling back, my lord, the Asrai now face one final battle. Let the Horn of Kurnous blast one last time in triumph, and rid the world of these foul creatures forever!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though the invading hordes are falling back, my lord, the Asrai now face one final battle. Let the Horn of Kurnous blast one last time in triumph, and rid the world of these foul creatures forever!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy come into sight, my lord! We have caught them by surprise: advance quickly before they can retreat!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy come into sight, my lord! We have caught them by surprise: advance quickly before they can retreat!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages is under attack, my lord, protect it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages is under attack, my lord, protect it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to advance with all your warriors at once, my lord! You risk becoming overwhelmed if you engage piecemeal.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to advance with all your warriors at once, my lord! You risk becoming overwhelmed if you engage piecemeal.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The elves of Athel Loren are a rare sight. These mysterious beings keep their own company and seldom emerge from their forests. Whilst they are not great in number, cross them at your peril.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Druchii intend to give battle, Prince Tyrion. Send your Elven warriors in to attack! Show the enemy no mercy!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You, the Asrai of Athel Loren, live in harmony with the great forest you call home. Yet there are those abroad who would endanger this paradise. Wield the sublime fury of nature against your foes and protect this woodland against all that may threaten it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You, the Asrai of Athel Loren, live in harmony with the great forest you call home. Yet there are those abroad who would endanger this paradise. Wield the sublime fury of nature against your foes and protect this woodland against all that may threaten it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The foolish rats dare to resist your advance, sire. Attack! Slaughter them, and take the pitiful survivors as slaves!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The foolish rats dare to resist your advance, sire. Attack! Slaughter them, and take the pitiful survivors as slaves!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your actions have not gone unnoticed, my lord. Dark forces are now massed all around us - they come to destroy the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs, for it is the essence of life within Athel Loren.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your actions have not gone unnoticed, my lord. Dark forces are now massed all around us - they come to destroy the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs, for it is the essence of life within Athel Loren.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Ancient and mighty Durthu, you are roused from slumber. Athel Loren lies in ruin and is in need of your strength.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to keep watch on your warriors in battle, my lord! Their very lives may depend upon it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to keep watch on your warriors in battle, my lord! Their very lives may depend upon it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your forces have been defeated in detail, my lord. They run from the battle! Let us retreat and regroup!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest rejuvenates, thanks to you. Yet the source of the sickness remains unknown - who is responsible?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Perhaps the ignorant Bretonnian interlopers, or the verminous mountain Goblins? Whoever the culprit, we must march on their lands and seize them as penance.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Look, Lord Mazdamundi! More Norse invaders advance against you. They come forward in great numbers!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: They seem to march without a leader, but their dark desires unify them all the same.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest is with you, Durthu. The ever-increasing threat of the Beastmen must be defeated immediately!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Durthu!
