onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Move quickly to defend this ridge, my lord. The trees will grant your warriors cover, while the slope will provide them an advantage in combat.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Move quickly to defend this ridge, my lord. The trees will grant your warriors cover, while the slope will provide them an advantage in combat.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur is struck from this world, nothing more than a stain upon the battlefield! A great victory has been won this day.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur is struck from this world, nothing more than a stain upon the battlefield! A great victory has been won this day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Allied forces approach, Tyrion! See that some amongst their number carry bows; they will be able to rain arrows upon the Druchii from behind your front lines.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Allied forces approach, Tyrion! See that some amongst their number carry bows; they will be able to rain arrows upon the Druchii from behind your front lines.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Allies come into view, sire! Press them into your service at once. Some amongst their number carry crossbows; they will be able to fire on the ratmen from behind your frontlines.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Allies come into view, sire! Press them into your service at once. Some amongst their number carry crossbows; they will be able to fire on the ratmen from behind your frontlines.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My lord! It is … it is Morghur! He is returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My lord! It is … it is Morghur! He is returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A party of Skinks, my lord! Press these allies into your service. Some amongst their number carry javelins to throw; these will prove most useful against the enemy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: His immortal soul is anchored to our world through foul magic beyond understanding. His defeat has slighted him, now he moves for the mountains intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. You must keep them at bay whilst strengthening the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry, there's not much time!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The reinforcements now fall under your control, my lord. Move the infantry into your frontline; the extra bodies are sorely needed.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The reinforcements now fall under your control, my lord. Move the infantry into your frontline; the extra bodies are sorely needed.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are imbued with the Oak's power now, Durthu, the forest is your strength. Such a power can destroy Morghur once and for all - go now, march to him, stop his plans. Destroy him forever!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are imbued with the Oak's power now, Durthu, the forest is your strength. Such a power can destroy Morghur once and for all - go now, march to him, stop his plans. Destroy him forever!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Does rage still beat in your heart, Durthu? Even now, with Morghur consigned to oblivion and the world returned from the brink? Does war still drive your mind?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Does rage still beat in your heart, Durthu? Even now, with Morghur consigned to oblivion and the world returned from the brink? Does war still drive your mind?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to arrange your infantry in a line for the coming battle, my lord. Each unit should cover the flank of the next. Do not let the enemy attack the sides of your formation, or break through to the rear!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to arrange your infantry in a line for the coming battle, my lord. Each unit should cover the flank of the next. Do not let the enemy attack the sides of your formation, or break through to the rear!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings Orion, King in the Woods - you awake to a world sorely in need of you. Athel Loren lies broken and in ruin.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: With it many great halls have fallen to darkness in your absence, and the once-mighty Oak of Ages is now a bleak shadow of its former glory.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though you are born into fleeting life, Orion, through your strength the forest will heal. This is the time of rebirth - for Ariel, for Kurnous, and for Athel Loren!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Druchii are driven from the field, my prince! The war to secure Ulthuan continues, but this day belongs to the Asur! Victory!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Skaven abandon the field, as is typical of their cowardly race! I almost pity the wounded they leave behind. Victory is yours!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Skaven abandon the field, as is typical of their cowardly race! I almost pity the wounded they leave behind. Victory is yours!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The courage of the Norse trespassers has failed them - they flee for their lives! Victory is yours, eternal lord!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The courage of the Norse trespassers has failed them - they flee for their lives! Victory is yours, eternal lord!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy flee the field, Warlord Queek! The Clanrats chitter your triumph. The head of the Elf-thing leader is yours to take. Victory!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy flee the field, Warlord Queek! The Clanrats chitter your triumph. The head of the Elf-thing leader is yours to take. Victory!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your halls are secure once more, Orion, but the larger question still remains; who is to blame for the damage done?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your halls are secure once more, Orion, but the larger question still remains; who is to blame for the damage done?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The last of your forces flee, my lord! This battle is lost; let us retreat and regroup!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The last of your forces flee, my lord! This battle is lost; let us retreat and regroup!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Mayhap our neighbours, the Bretonnians? Or the ever-festering Orcs from the mountains? Whoever is responsible, we must push forth from the forests to seize their lands in retribution.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Mayhap our neighbours, the Bretonnians? Or the ever-festering Orcs from the mountains? Whoever is responsible, we must push forth from the forests to seize their lands in retribution.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Riotous Beastmen have been spotted near our borders, my lord, doubtless intent on spreading their Chaotic brutality. They are surely responsible for defiling our halls; it is what they live for.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Riotous Beastmen have been spotted near our borders, my lord, doubtless intent on spreading their Chaotic brutality. They are surely responsible for defiling our halls; it is what they live for.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: They appear now leaderless, but still single-mindedly bent on a vision of pure destruction.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: They appear now leaderless, but still single-mindedly bent on a vision of pure destruction.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Assign individual targets for each of your units when attacking, my lord. Keep a wide formation; do not let your forces be surrounded!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Assign individual targets for each of your units when attacking, my lord. Keep a wide formation; do not let your forces be surrounded!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The threat they pose is ever-increasing. Do not underestimate them; they are the enemy of all civilisation. You must confront these ravenous beasts and put them to rout.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The threat they pose is ever-increasing. Do not underestimate them; they are the enemy of all civilisation. You must confront these ravenous beasts and put them to rout.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur! The vile, twisted Beastlord of corruption and mutation emerges from the shadows to rain his destruction upon our realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur! The vile, twisted Beastlord of corruption and mutation emerges from the shadows to rain his destruction upon our realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Orion!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Orion!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Druchii soldiers are ready for battle, Malekith, my king. Each one of them yearns to spill the blood of the enemy in your name.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Druchii soldiers are ready for battle, Malekith, my king. Each one of them yearns to spill the blood of the enemy in your name.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur falls! Take heart, for the Asrai prevail against this tide of corruption. A great victory has been won this day.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur falls! Take heart, for the Asrai prevail against this tide of corruption. A great victory has been won this day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your fearsome cohorts line up ready for battle, revered lord. They await only your command to advance.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your fearsome cohorts line up ready for battle, revered lord. They await only your command to advance.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Clanrats are ready for battle, mightiest of Warlords. Each one stands ready to fight, eager to gain your favour.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Clanrats are ready for battle, mightiest of Warlords. Each one stands ready to fight, eager to gain your favour.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My lord! It is Morghur! He has returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My lord! It is Morghur! He has returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Slighted by defeat, he lusts now for ultimate revenge. Even now, he marches for the mountains, intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Slighted by defeat, he lusts now for ultimate revenge. Even now, he marches for the mountains, intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The time has come to advance your warriors, my lord. Select your whole army, so that the order may be given to all.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The time has come to advance your warriors, my lord. Select your whole army, so that the order may be given to all.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. Push them back, Orion, and strengthen the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry; there is not much time!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. Push them back, Orion, and strengthen the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry; there is not much time!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! Now, order your army forward, my lord. Let us crest this ridge and find where the enemy lies.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! Now, order your army forward, my lord. Let us crest this ridge and find where the enemy lies.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The power of the forest flows through you now, Orion - you have the strength to stop Morghur. Go now; his victory is within his reach. March on him, stop the carnage! Stop Morghur!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The power of the forest flows through you now, Orion - you have the strength to stop Morghur. Go now; his victory is within his reach. March on him, stop the carnage! Stop Morghur!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Excellent! Your place is amongst your warriors, mighty lord. Your very presence encourages them to fight harder.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Excellent! Your place is amongst your warriors, mighty lord. Your very presence encourages them to fight harder.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Victory! Morghur is relegated to oblivion, Orion, along with his feculent ilk!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Victory! Morghur is relegated to oblivion, Orion, along with his feculent ilk!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have held Athel Loren against the beastly hordes and averted absolute catastrophe from befalling the entire world.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have held Athel Loren against the beastly hordes and averted absolute catastrophe from befalling the entire world.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Now, winter is approaching; we all feel the icy chill upon the air. The time has come for you to return to the Oak of Ages; Ariel is calling.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Now, winter is approaching; we all feel the icy chill upon the air. The time has come for you to return to the Oak of Ages; Ariel is calling.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Advance upon the ridge without delay, my lord! That position offers you the best chance of victory against such a number. Order your forces forward, quickly!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Advance upon the ridge without delay, my lord! That position offers you the best chance of victory against such a number. Order your forces forward, quickly!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Step into Athel Loren's leafy embrace and begin the cycle of renewal once again. This is one end, Orion, but every end is a new beginning…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Step into Athel Loren's leafy embrace and begin the cycle of renewal once again. This is one end, Orion, but every end is a new beginning…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Excellent, my lord! The ridge is yours. Move your infantry out to block the pass and await the enemy's arrival. Do not be tempted out of position!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Excellent, my lord! The ridge is yours. Move your infantry out to block the pass and await the enemy's arrival. Do not be tempted out of position!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your presence on the field inspires the Elves you command, Prince Tyrion. Under your leadership, your warriors will advance with great confidence into battle. Wield your influence wisely!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your presence on the field inspires the Elves you command, Prince Tyrion. Under your leadership, your warriors will advance with great confidence into battle. Wield your influence wisely!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Place your fresh missile troops behind your army. They will fire automatically if the enemy come into range.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Place your fresh missile troops behind your army. They will fire automatically if the enemy come into range.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings to you, Morghur, eternal agent of change. You are reborn from Chaos once again that you may hasten the mutation of this world, and bring Ruin to its people.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Greetings to you, Morghur, eternal agent of change. You are reborn from Chaos once again that you may hasten the mutation of this world, and bring Ruin to its people.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Man has ever been the true enemy of the Beastmen, Morghur, and none more so than the hated Empire. Descend upon their lands and bring down a fury that will shake the foundations of the earth!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Man has ever been the true enemy of the Beastmen, Morghur, and none more so than the hated Empire. Descend upon their lands and bring down a fury that will shake the foundations of the earth!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet there are others who would oppose you. The Wood Elves, hidden behind their sanctuary trees, have long stood in opposition to your goals. Twist their gnarled roots into unknowable agony; let them know defeat!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet there are others who would oppose you. The Wood Elves, hidden behind their sanctuary trees, have long stood in opposition to your goals. Twist their gnarled roots into unknowable agony; let them know defeat!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, more men stand against you. They who call themselves 'Bretonnians' should be utterly crushed - their glittering spires and dreams of chivalry brought to nought but rubble!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, more men stand against you. They who call themselves 'Bretonnians' should be utterly crushed - their glittering spires and dreams of chivalry brought to nought but rubble!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are Morghur, the Shadowgave, the Master of Skulls. Your time is now. Visit upon this world such horrors that generations yet unborn will scream in torment!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are Morghur, the Shadowgave, the Master of Skulls. Your time is now. Visit upon this world such horrors that generations yet unborn will scream in torment!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My lord! His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My lord! His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be ever vigilant, my eternal lord. I come to render my assistance to the forest, for this is a time of great peril for Athel Loren; potential enemies are at every turn.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be ever vigilant, my eternal lord. I come to render my assistance to the forest, for this is a time of great peril for Athel Loren; potential enemies are at every turn.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, the Bretonnians lie in wait. We must tread carefully, for their expansionist desires are well known, yet they could be firm allies against other foes.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, the Bretonnians lie in wait. We must tread carefully, for their expansionist desires are well known, yet they could be firm allies against other foes.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Furthermore, Greenskin incursions are increasing - they defile the sanctity of the forests with their filth. The only answer is war - move against their mountain hovels and end their sorry sorties.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Furthermore, Greenskin incursions are increasing - they defile the sanctity of the forests with their filth. The only answer is war - move against their mountain hovels and end their sorry sorties.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the west, the Beastmen herds are massing. These cloven beasts will desecrate everything, including your sacred woodlands, unless stopped by force of arms. You must turn the tables, take the hunt to them - the taint of Chaos must not despoil the King's Glade!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the west, the Beastmen herds are massing. These cloven beasts will desecrate everything, including your sacred woodlands, unless stopped by force of arms. You must turn the tables, take the hunt to them - the taint of Chaos must not despoil the King's Glade!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though the men of the lowlands know the price of intrusion, they still trespass upon your hallowed groves. No more. Drive them from the forest's edge!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though the men of the lowlands know the price of intrusion, they still trespass upon your hallowed groves. No more. Drive them from the forest's edge!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages is threatened, Lord Orion, and it is time to unite in their defence. The Asrai of Athel Loren shall be ascendant - to war!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages is threatened, Lord Orion, and it is time to unite in their defence. The Asrai of Athel Loren shall be ascendant - to war!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail to you, Durthu, Eldest of the Ancients. I come to offer assistance in these dark times - to help you exact revenge on the enemies of Athel Loren.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hail to you, Durthu, Eldest of the Ancients. I come to offer assistance in these dark times - to help you exact revenge on the enemies of Athel Loren.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, the Bretonnians lie in wait. We must tread carefully, for their expansionist desires are well known, yet they could be firm allies against other foes.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Furthermore, Greenskin incursions are increasing, defiling the sanctity of the forests with their filth. The only answer is war - move against their mountain hovels and end their sorry sorties into your lands.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Furthermore, Greenskin incursions are increasing, defiling the sanctity of the forests with their filth. The only answer is war - move against their mountain hovels and end their sorry sorties into your lands.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the west, the Beastmen herds are massing. These cloven beasts will desecrate everything, including your sacred woodlands, unless stopped by force of arms. You must turn the tables, take the hunt to them - the taint of Chaos must not despoil the King's Glade!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the west, the Beastmen herds are massing. These cloven beasts will desecrate everything, including your sacred woodlands, unless stopped by force of arms. You must turn the tables, take the hunt to them - the taint of Chaos must not despoil the King's Glade!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though the men of the lowlands know the price of intrusion, they still trespass upon your hallowed groves. No more. Drive them from the forest's edge!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though the men of the lowlands know the price of intrusion, they still trespass upon your hallowed groves. No more. Drive them from the forest's edge!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Age has made you twisted and furious, Father of the Forest, but this rage makes you mighty. Go now - smite the unworthy! Defend Athel Loren!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Age has made you twisted and furious, Father of the Forest, but this rage makes you mighty. Go now - smite the unworthy! Defend Athel Loren!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages stands strong in the face of adversity.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages stands strong in the face of adversity.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have the strength to stop Morghur.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have the strength to stop Morghur.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Battle has been joined, my lord. Order your forces forward to envelop the enemy where possible. Do not leave troops idle!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Battle has been joined, my lord. Order your forces forward to envelop the enemy where possible. Do not leave troops idle!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Let the Horn of Kurnous blast one last time in triumph, and rid the world of these foul creatures forever!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Let the Horn of Kurnous blast one last time in triumph, and rid the world of these foul creatures forever!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I humbly beg of your attention, Prince Tyrion. I come with blessings from the Loremasters of Saphery. Though I am but a short-lived man, my advice may be of use in this black hour.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I humbly beg of your attention, Prince Tyrion. I come with blessings from the Loremasters of Saphery. Though I am but a short-lived man, my advice may be of use in this black hour.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Protect the Oak of Ages, my lord! Should it fall, the sacred forest will surely wilt away with it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Protect the Oak of Ages, my lord! Should it fall, the sacred forest will surely wilt away with it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dark Elves, or Druchii as they are called by your kind, have yoked the malevolent energies unleashed by the comet's appearance. With them, they have found a route through the Shifting Isles to the southern shores of your homeland, Ulthuan.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Dark Elves, or Druchii as they are called by your kind, have yoked the malevolent energies unleashed by the comet's appearance. With them, they have found a route through the Shifting Isles to the southern shores of your homeland, Ulthuan.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I regret to inform that in your absence their dreaded forces have run rampant across Ulthuan. While your capital, Lothern, remains uncompromised, several smaller cities have fallen.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I regret to inform that in your absence their dreaded forces have run rampant across Ulthuan. While your capital, Lothern, remains uncompromised, several smaller cities have fallen.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages stands strong in the face of adversity. Make sure it remains so, my lord.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages stands strong in the face of adversity. Make sure it remains so, my lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The city-port of Lothern, your capital, is the seat of the Phoenix King. A garrison defends the city but it is gravely threatened.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The city-port of Lothern, your capital, is the seat of the Phoenix King. A garrison defends the city but it is gravely threatened.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Druchii raiders sack the surrounding countryside, probing the city's defences. The Phoenix Throne cannot be allowed to fall; the Dark Elves must be engaged and driven from Ulthuan!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Druchii raiders sack the surrounding countryside, probing the city's defences. The Phoenix Throne cannot be allowed to fall; the Dark Elves must be engaged and driven from Ulthuan!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Lightning strikes by the enemy have gained them control of the Tower of Lysean, Lord Tyrion. Its capture means they now command the straits of Lothern at both ends.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Lightning strikes by the enemy have gained them control of the Tower of Lysean, Lord Tyrion. Its capture means they now command the straits of Lothern at both ends.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Furthermore, scouts report that the Dark Elves have struck at Angerrial and overrun the defences there. Digging them out of this fortified city will not be easy, my prince. The Druchii must not be left to despoil the inner kingdoms of Ulthuan!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Furthermore, scouts report that the Dark Elves have struck at Angerrial and overrun the defences there. Digging them out of this fortified city will not be easy, my prince. The Druchii must not be left to despoil the inner kingdoms of Ulthuan!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail to you, o cold and beautiful Isabella! Mannfred dwells in Castle Drakenhof, your rightful home! So whilst you should be rightfully proud of what you have achieved so far, there is clearly still much to be done.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hail to you, o cold and beautiful Isabella! Mannfred dwells in Castle Drakenhof, your rightful home! So whilst you should be rightfully proud of what you have achieved so far, there is clearly still much to be done.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your host enters the theatre of war, Prince Tyrion. Wield your forces wisely; they are your best hope for averting Lothern's destruction.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your host enters the theatre of war, Prince Tyrion. Wield your forces wisely; they are your best hope for averting Lothern's destruction.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They cannot be suffered to endure, lest they threaten your strength. Raise your forces, march on the foe, and show them true terror!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They cannot be suffered to endure, lest they threaten your strength. Raise your forces, march on the foe, and show them true terror!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Prince Tyrion, now is the perfect time to attack. Select your army first.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Prince Tyrion, now is the perfect time to attack. Select your army first.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The high mountains to the south are infested with Dwarfs. Our lands will never be safe with such an enemy so close. Make plans to drive out their stunted kind in time.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The high mountains to the south are infested with Dwarfs. Our lands will never be safe with such an enemy so close. Make plans to drive out their stunted kind in time.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are the power behind the mightiest of the von Carstein bloodline. Cruel and wicked mistress - the world shudders at what ruin you might make.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are the power behind the mightiest of the von Carstein bloodline. Cruel and wicked mistress - the world shudders at what ruin you might make.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Battle is upon you, Prince Tyrion! Have your host sharpen their swords, fasten their armour, and prepare for bloodshed!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Battle is upon you, Prince Tyrion! Have your host sharpen their swords, fasten their armour, and prepare for bloodshed!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Phoenix King sends his congratulations, Prince Tyrion, for the Druchii invaders have been driven from the field! The fate of those taken captive from the battle is yours to decide.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Phoenix King sends his congratulations, Prince Tyrion, for the Druchii invaders have been driven from the field! The fate of those taken captive from the battle is yours to decide.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: So set forth, Isabella, wife and warrior, beauty, and horror. The fury in your eyes will bring this world to its knees!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: So set forth, Isabella, wife and warrior, beauty, and horror. The fury in your eyes will bring this world to its knees!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your forces are weary from battle, yet they still retain some strength to march on. See for yourself.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your forces are weary from battle, yet they still retain some strength to march on. See for yourself.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The distance your army can still move is shown around it, my lord. Plan your movements wisely, for your armies cannot defend the realm if they are not present to fight.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The distance your army can still move is shown around it, my lord. Plan your movements wisely, for your armies cannot defend the realm if they are not present to fight.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy still threaten your capital, Prince Tyrion. Move now to block the route from the south and close off the possibility of attack.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy still threaten your capital, Prince Tyrion. Move now to block the route from the south and close off the possibility of attack.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: War has brought us to these unforgiving wastes, where the Ruinous Powers lie in wait to ensnare us. But Bretonnian Knights are formidable warriors and driven by the most noble of purposes! The kingdom is relying on you, my lord, you must drive the filth back into the mire!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: War has brought us to these unforgiving wastes, where the Ruinous Powers lie in wait to ensnare us. But Bretonnian Knights are formidable warriors and driven by the most noble of purposes! The kingdom is relying on you, my lord, you must drive the filth back into the mire!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Badlands teem with Greenskins, my lord; this truly is the belly of the beast! Orcs and Goblins move to trap your forces. – You must endure the green tide, fight hard to overcome it, and smite this evil, in the Lady’s blessed name!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Badlands teem with Greenskins, my lord; this truly is the belly of the beast! Orcs and Goblins move to trap your forces. – You must endure the green tide, fight hard to overcome it, and smite this evil, in the Lady’s blessed name!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! Your army now blocks the approach to your capital. Any attack by the enemy will need to get by you first. See for yourself how your forces control the area around them.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! Your army now blocks the approach to your capital. Any attack by the enemy will need to get by you first. See for yourself how your forces control the area around them.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A blessing has been bestowed upon these men. The Lady will protect them for their heroism.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A blessing has been bestowed upon these men. The Lady will protect them for their heroism.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: More Asur stand ready to take up arms in the name of the Phoenix King. Recruit them now, and they will be ready to fight in the battles to come.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: More Asur stand ready to take up arms in the name of the Phoenix King. Recruit them now, and they will be ready to fight in the battles to come.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Excellent choices, my lord. Be aware that the recruits will take time to train, and that your army must remain stationary while they do so.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Excellent choices, my lord. Be aware that the recruits will take time to train, and that your army must remain stationary while they do so.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lady blesses these men and grants them protection for their actions.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lady blesses these men and grants them protection for their actions.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Let us review what destruction the Druchii have wrought on your territory, my prince. Select Lothern to inspect your province.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Let us review what destruction the Druchii have wrought on your territory, my prince. Select Lothern to inspect your province.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Here we may see the state of the province that surrounds your capital. The enemy raids have caused considerable unrest; public order is suffering as you can see, my lord. The agitators will need calming in time, but matters of defence are more pressing.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Here we may see the state of the province that surrounds your capital. The enemy raids have caused considerable unrest; public order is suffering as you can see, my lord. The agitators will need calming in time, but matters of defence are more pressing.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Cities within the local province are shown here, my lord, along with any facilities they contain.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Cities within the local province are shown here, my lord, along with any facilities they contain.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: These men will resist the enemies of Bretonnia, with the Lady now protecting them.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your capital, and the buildings it contains are shown here, my lord. Work needs to be done to improve its readiness for war.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your capital, and the buildings it contains are shown here, my lord. Work needs to be done to improve its readiness for war.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lady no longer favours these men, for they retreat from battle.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lady no longer favours these men, for they retreat from battle.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your cities are the backbone of your state, my lord. Taxes are raised through them, and they provide the infrastructure necessary to support your armies. I humbly suggest you commission upgrades to your capital as soon as possible.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your cities are the backbone of your state, my lord. Taxes are raised through them, and they provide the infrastructure necessary to support your armies. I humbly suggest you commission upgrades to your capital as soon as possible.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A display of noble action and good intent, my lord. Good things will come to those that possess these virtues.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A display of noble action and good intent, my lord. Good things will come to those that possess these virtues.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! Construction will begin immediately, but will take some time to complete.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! Construction will begin immediately, but will take some time to complete.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Seek ways to further even the vast knowledge of the Druchii, sire. Put the finest minds to work on improving your methods of war.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Seek ways to further even the vast knowledge of the Druchii, sire. Put the finest minds to work on improving your methods of war.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! In time, the knowledge they gain will surely aide your cause.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! In time, the knowledge they gain will surely aide your cause.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: These are troubled times indeed when such unchivalrous actions are deemed just. Let us turn a blind eye to them for now.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: These are troubled times indeed when such unchivalrous actions are deemed just. Let us turn a blind eye to them for now.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your current actions are quite unchivalrous, my lord. You do not display the virtues you once did.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your current actions are quite unchivalrous, my lord. You do not display the virtues you once did.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: There is nothing more you can do for now, my lord. Let us await your enemy's next move.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: There is nothing more you can do for now, my lord. Let us await your enemy's next move.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy opt to attack your position, my lord! Ready your forces, for battle is upon you once more!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy opt to attack your position, my lord! Ready your forces, for battle is upon you once more!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Knightly Orders were formed by a chivalric code, your actions leave them questioning you.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Knightly Orders were formed by a chivalric code, your actions leave them questioning you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The province surrounding your capital is shown here, my lord. A province may contain many cities, each exerting authority over the territory surrounding them. Control the cities and you control the land.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The province surrounding your capital is shown here, my lord. A province may contain many cities, each exerting authority over the territory surrounding them. Control the cities and you control the land.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia weeps, for your honour and chivalry have been lost this day.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bretonnia weeps, for your honour and chivalry have been lost this day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Many unscrupulous actions have taken you down a dark and unchivalrous path, my lord. You will no doubt feel the Lady's wrath for this.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Many unscrupulous actions have taken you down a dark and unchivalrous path, my lord. You will no doubt feel the Lady's wrath for this.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Asur's history with the Druchii goes back millennia - you are no stranger to their wicked and vicious methods of war. They must not be allowed to enter your capital!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Asur's history with the Druchii goes back millennia - you are no stranger to their wicked and vicious methods of war. They must not be allowed to enter your capital!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Noble indeed, my lord. Like the Grail Companions before you, you honour the code of Chivalry and will be rewarded for it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Noble indeed, my lord. Like the Grail Companions before you, you honour the code of Chivalry and will be rewarded for it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lady looks upon you favourably, my lord. Bretonnia rejoices under your chivalric rule and courageous acts.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lady looks upon you favourably, my lord. Bretonnia rejoices under your chivalric rule and courageous acts.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bells ring out through the lands, Bretonnia prospers this day under your chivalric rule. Many great virtues will be bestowed upon you.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bells ring out through the lands, Bretonnia prospers this day under your chivalric rule. Many great virtues will be bestowed upon you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Excellent! Your army advance in search of the enemy, my lord. Take this time to practice manoeuvring your forces while not under threat of attack. Remember, always, that orders are issued only to units currently selected.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Excellent! Your army advance in search of the enemy, my lord. Take this time to practice manoeuvring your forces while not under threat of attack. Remember, always, that orders are issued only to units currently selected.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My lord, the dukes of Bretonnia have resided under a Chivalrous code for many years. Honour this tradition, build upon the great foundations of Gilles le Breton, and lead the Knightly Orders forward, to glory!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My lord, the dukes of Bretonnia have resided under a Chivalrous code for many years. Honour this tradition, build upon the great foundations of Gilles le Breton, and lead the Knightly Orders forward, to glory!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Advance against the foolish Elves, Lord Queek! Let them learn why you are called 'Headtaker'!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Advance against the foolish Elves, Lord Queek! Let them learn why you are called 'Headtaker'!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Our lands prosper under your chivalrous rule, yet evil still breeds in every corner. Many look to destroy Bretonnia, and their power grows as quickly as our own. Stave off their advances and unite the banners of Bretonnia through your chivalric actions!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Our lands prosper under your chivalrous rule, yet evil still breeds in every corner. Many look to destroy Bretonnia, and their power grows as quickly as our own. Stave off their advances and unite the banners of Bretonnia through your chivalric actions!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Allied Skaven, my lord! Conscript them into your service at once. Some amongst them bear slings and missiles; such weapons will be of great use against the foe.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Allied Skaven, my lord! Conscript them into your service at once. Some amongst them bear slings and missiles; such weapons will be of great use against the foe.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia stands strong as the protector of honour and chivalry. Yet one last challenge must still be met, in the wastes of the Old World. Our king prepares for battle on the grandest of scales and calls forth an Errantry War. I ask you now to bestow your great virtues upon us and lead the Knightly Orders to their final victory over our enemy!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bretonnia stands strong as the protector of honour and chivalry. Yet one last challenge must still be met, in the wastes of the Old World. Our king prepares for battle on the grandest of scales and calls forth an Errantry War. I ask you now to bestow your great virtues upon us and lead the Knightly Orders to their final victory over our enemy!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia flowers in true splendour - tales shall be told of your chivalric deeds for years to come! As our borders expand so our code of chivalry spreads with it. Do not relent, for Bretonnia will be the beacon of light in this ever crumbling world.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bretonnia flowers in true splendour - tales shall be told of your chivalric deeds for years to come! As our borders expand so our code of chivalry spreads with it. Do not relent, for Bretonnia will be the beacon of light in this ever crumbling world.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy are nearly upon you, my lord! Be sure to make your presence felt in the coming battle: you have many abilities to rally and empower your troops. Now is the time to use them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy are nearly upon you, my lord! Be sure to make your presence felt in the coming battle: you have many abilities to rally and empower your troops. Now is the time to use them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Folklore tells of a mighty champion who will emerge from the mist to protect the dukes of Bretonnia in their hour of need, cleansing the land of its enemies.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Folklore tells of a mighty champion who will emerge from the mist to protect the dukes of Bretonnia in their hour of need, cleansing the land of its enemies.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your reinforcements approach the battle. Have them charge the enemy rear! The impact alone may break their courage to fight!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your reinforcements approach the battle. Have them charge the enemy rear! The impact alone may break their courage to fight!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your chivalrous code has not gone unnoticed. The skies cloud over and twilight has fallen. A figure stands ready; its eyes ablaze with fay light in the mist.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your chivalrous code has not gone unnoticed. The skies cloud over and twilight has fallen. A figure stands ready; its eyes ablaze with fay light in the mist.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though your rapid march south has brought some welcome additional forces, the situation remains grim. See for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though your rapid march south has brought some welcome additional forces, the situation remains grim. See for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Battle is upon you once again, my lord! Your forces are ready to deploy for the coming engagement. They may be positioned anywhere within the area shown.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Battle is upon you once again, my lord! Your forces are ready to deploy for the coming engagement. They may be positioned anywhere within the area shown.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Like in the childhood tales of old, the Green Knight rides for battle, striking fear into all those that oppose Bretonnia.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Like in the childhood tales of old, the Green Knight rides for battle, striking fear into all those that oppose Bretonnia.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: This forest may be used to conceal your forces. Arrange your cavalry here, my lord, and they will remain unseen until the enemy draw close.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: This forest may be used to conceal your forces. Arrange your cavalry here, my lord, and they will remain unseen until the enemy draw close.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Alas the Green Knight fades with the mist as quickly as he emerged. Perhaps he will appear again when the need is great?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Alas the Green Knight fades with the mist as quickly as he emerged. Perhaps he will appear again when the need is great?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The peasants of Bretonnia are the workforce of our farms and mills. Enlisting too many to bolster your forces will come at a cost to your farming income.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The peasants of Bretonnia are the workforce of our farms and mills. Enlisting too many to bolster your forces will come at a cost to your farming income.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Our fields and orchards are short of workers and with it our income dwindles. See that manpower is improved to reap the benefits of the land.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Our fields and orchards are short of workers and with it our income dwindles. See that manpower is improved to reap the benefits of the land.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! Your troops are now hidden from enemy sight, as you can see.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! Your troops are now hidden from enemy sight, as you can see.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Pay attention to your unit cards, my lord, for they indicate the status of your troops. Be mindful of your army; success on the battlefield depends upon it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Pay attention to your unit cards, my lord, for they indicate the status of your troops. Be mindful of your army; success on the battlefield depends upon it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: This ridge will afford your troops an edge in the coming battle, my lord. Place the rest of your troops close by and claim its forward slopes once battle begins.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good! Your troops are ready, my lord. Just give the signal and the engagement shall begin!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good! Your troops are ready, my lord. Just give the signal and the engagement shall begin!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To arms, then! The enemy enter the field. Advance and claim the hilltop, my lord. Its slopes will serve your forces well. Keep your cavalry hidden!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail, Alberic, Duke of Bordeleaux! The salty sea air is a bracing reprieve from the cloying, inland darkness that now threatens the coast.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hail, Alberic, Duke of Bordeleaux! The salty sea air is a bracing reprieve from the cloying, inland darkness that now threatens the coast.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Directly North, the damned city of Mousillon spits out dark forces that you must deal with. Bretonnia may ignore this blight, but you cannot.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: King Leoncoeur resides at Couronne, but is beset by the Greenskin threat from the nearby mountains. You are expected to aid the crown, but ultimately it is your choice alone.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: King Leoncoeur resides at Couronne, but is beset by the Greenskin threat from the nearby mountains. You are expected to aid the crown, but ultimately it is your choice alone.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The merchant princes of Marienburg have no love for Bretonnia, they are more concerned with the accumulation of wealth. Gluttons, yes, but perhaps useful…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The merchant princes of Marienburg have no love for Bretonnia, they are more concerned with the accumulation of wealth. Gluttons, yes, but perhaps useful…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The mountains teem with Greenskins and Dwarfs, constantly warring with one another. Should they descend from their peaks into Bretonnia, conflict will surely follow.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The mountains teem with Greenskins and Dwarfs, constantly warring with one another. Should they descend from their peaks into Bretonnia, conflict will surely follow.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A storm is brewing above Bretonnia, my lord, with a ferocity that Bordeleaux cannot avoid. You may not be king, Alberic, but Manann watches over you. Use his thalassic strength to defend Bordeleaux and wash your enemies away!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A storm is brewing above Bretonnia, my lord, with a ferocity that Bordeleaux cannot avoid. You may not be king, Alberic, but Manann watches over you. Use his thalassic strength to defend Bordeleaux and wash your enemies away!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Blessings on you and your lands, wise and Fay Enchantress. Your kingdom is in peril and has need of your strength- dark clouds are brewing abroad.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Blessings on you and your lands, wise and Fay Enchantress. Your kingdom is in peril and has need of your strength- dark clouds are brewing abroad.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elves of Athel Loren grow bold of late. Their expansionist desires see them encroaching beyond the limits of the forest. Hold your own against their ilk.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Elves of Athel Loren grow bold of late. Their expansionist desires see them encroaching beyond the limits of the forest. Hold your own against their ilk.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The nearby mountains are infested with Greenskins - as ever they battle the stubborn Dwarfs. Be vigilant, lest their filthy scourge infects Bretonnian lands…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The savage Beastlord, Khazrak, dwells nearby. He is set upon a path of war that will invariably bring him into contact with you. You must defeat this Ruinous threat!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Ever-blessed by the Lady of the Lake, Bretonnian lands serve the goddess completely. Show no fear; march forth and in her name restore the virtue of your realm!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings to you, benevolent royarch. Blessed is your rule over Bretonnia, yet darkness spreads from abroad and threatens your kingdom. The threat is real; it must be faced.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the east, the greedy merchant princes of Marienburg conspire to consolidate their riches. Observe that much wealth flows into Marienburg, but very little emerges.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Further South, in the Grey Mountains, Greenskins and Dwarfs vie for control of the peaks. Whoever wins may yet cause trouble for you, my lord…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Further South, in the Grey Mountains, Greenskins and Dwarfs vie for control of the peaks. Whoever wins may yet cause trouble for you, my lord…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beyond, the Wood Elves in their mysterious forest protect their homes. Whilst at the coast, the Duke of Bordeleaux is as unpredictable as the roiling sea and as secretive as the watery depths.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Beyond, the Wood Elves in their mysterious forest protect their homes. Whilst at the coast, the Duke of Bordeleaux is as unpredictable as the roiling sea and as secretive as the watery depths.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Elsewhere, the Unliving lords of Mousillon wage war against mortal men. The bickering dukedoms ignore the looming threat, and so it falls to you to act, my liege.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Only a united Bretonnia can face these growing perils. Raise your banner, King Leoncoeur, and drive this evil from the world in the Lady's blessed name!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Only a united Bretonnia can face these growing perils. Raise your banner, King Leoncoeur, and drive this evil from the world in the Lady's blessed name!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet other clans have done the same. Though together you may do great work, they are not to be trusted. Only Clan Pestilens should prosper here - do what you must to survive.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You count amongst your Asur kin some of the finest minds in all creation. Put them to work on improving your methods of warfare, my lord. For this task they will need even grander edifices.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Reptile-things should not be here! Why have they resettled old-festering ruins? What are they up to, mmm? Attack soon - claim this place for Clan Pestilens!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: An attack on Ghrond should not be undertaken lightly, but is surely necessary to secure its power for your cause.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Premonitions of a corrupting evil have come upon the Slann, my children. The Great Plan is in peril.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Premonitions of a corrupting evil have come upon the Slann, my children. The Great Plan is in peril.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your kind have often had cause to discipline the Skeggi raiders that dwell on the edge of the jungle, but never have they marched against you in such numbers. It would seem that Sotek’s comet has incited the lesser races into acts of madness!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: More horrible-brave Elf-things to the south - rumours of huge Warpstone deposits here-here too!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: At the desert's edge lies the magnificent Charnel Valley, mighty tombs and the resting place of kings from ancient dynasties. The wealth within attracts many still-breathing raiders.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dark Elves advance upon you, my lord! The vainglorious Witch King must never gain the power of the Vortex for himself. Draw up your defences!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: His wish exiled me... to roam these frozen and barren lands of Naggaroth, but they will not stop me from still serving my king. I have failed him once in the search for Unlife, but I shall not fail again.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Glory to you, Prince Tyrion, mightiest of the Asur, gatekeeper of Ulthuan. The Druchii threat is at your very door. Eataine is occupied - you must purge this menace!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Glory to you, Prince Tyrion, mightiest of the Asur, gatekeeper of Ulthuan. The Druchii threat is at your very door. Eataine is occupied - you must purge this menace!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Caverns are now firmly in your control, mighty Queek! Clan Moulder are routed into their burrows, yet beware of reprisals from their allies on the surface. onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The inhabitants of Lustria may resist our intrusion, but our cause must prevail. The Vortex must be secured, lest the world drown in a tide of Chaos!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Seek out the knowledge of the Arch-Necromancer, my followers! From his blasphemous tomes flows the power to cleanse this world of Vampires. Find them, and bring them to me!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Those that trespass against the Great Plan must suffer the consequences, my children. The will of the Old Ones must be fulfilled!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, great Warherds raid these broken lands, defiling all and leaving ruins in their wake. Somewhere perhaps you can resurrect a stronger cult.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the south, great Warherds raid these broken lands, defiling all and leaving ruins in their wake. Somewhere perhaps you can resurrect a stronger cult.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forces of Bretonnia have been sighted nearby. Their Knights claim to be the most brave and valiant warriors in all the world, but they have not yet come up against you, mighty lord.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forces of Bretonnia have been sighted nearby. Their Knights claim to be the most brave and valiant warriors in all the world, but they have not yet come up against you, mighty lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The city of the sun is well defended, enlightened lord. Scars on its outer walls bear witness to the numberless attacks it has repulsed over the millennia.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The city of the sun is well defended, enlightened lord. Scars on its outer walls bear witness to the numberless attacks it has repulsed over the millennia.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet we are not alone in seeking to yoke its power. The under-vermin march against us in number, driven to suicide against my wrath in service of some mad scheme.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet we are not alone in seeking to yoke its power. The under-vermin march against us in number, driven to suicide against my wrath in service of some mad scheme.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Cultists rejoice, for another book of the Great Betrayer is secured. Its power is mine to command! Seek out more!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Cultists rejoice, for another book of the Great Betrayer is secured. Its power is mine to command! Seek out more!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Battle is upon you, Lord Queek! Your Clanrats are vicious and strong when motivated, but will be well-matched by the agile and deadly foe. Prepare yourself for bloodshed!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Battle is upon you, Lord Queek! Your Clanrats are vicious and strong when motivated, but will be well-matched by the agile and deadly foe. Prepare yourself for bloodshed!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The wars to come will be fought using guile as well as brawn. Consider expanding your facilities to permit the recruitment of Heroes, my lord. Heroes can be hired to support your forces, or to strike against the enemy.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The wars to come will be fought using guile as well as brawn. Consider expanding your facilities to permit the recruitment of Heroes, my lord. Heroes can be hired to support your forces, or to strike against the enemy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It is the greatest insult that Vaul the Maker, Elven God of Smiths, has never blessed the sword you have forged - Destroyer! Now is the time to right that wrong!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It is the greatest insult that Vaul the Maker, Elven God of Smiths, has never blessed the sword you have forged - Destroyer! Now is the time to right that wrong!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Dark blessings to you, Hag Sorceress! Though you are reviled by all, your power is beyond reckoning. Chaos drives you and none can stand against your might.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Dark blessings to you, Hag Sorceress! Though you are reviled by all, your power is beyond reckoning. Chaos drives you and none can stand against your might.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lizardmen move in number, re-entering ruined cities in their search for magical artefacts. They must seek some machination regarding the Vortex. It is imperative that we act first; the Servants of the Old Ones would sink all of Ulthuan if it served their purpose.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lizardmen move in number, re-entering ruined cities in their search for magical artefacts. They must seek some machination regarding the Vortex. It is imperative that we act first; the Servants of the Old Ones would sink all of Ulthuan if it served their purpose.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are far from home, Prince Teclis. Your wayfaring has brought you to the Star Tower and the surrounding Volcanic Islands. The Loremasters of the White Tower would welcome a new colony upon these isles, yet there are threats lurking nearby.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are far from home, Prince Teclis. Your wayfaring has brought you to the Star Tower and the surrounding Volcanic Islands. The Loremasters of the White Tower would welcome a new colony upon these isles, yet there are threats lurking nearby.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Arkhan, the world resides in turmoil, our enemies' weaknesses are exposed. The Followers of Nagash stand ready to do your bidding.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Arkhan, the world resides in turmoil, our enemies' weaknesses are exposed. The Followers of Nagash stand ready to do your bidding.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Oh, insightful Khatep, how you have fallen from your king's grace. Exiled here to roam these barren lands in solitude, but there is a way to restore the power of the Mortuary Cult.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Oh, insightful Khatep, how you have fallen from your king's grace. Exiled here to roam these barren lands in solitude, but there is a way to restore the power of the Mortuary Cult.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Towards the coast, in the east, Dark Elves reside within their dark fortresses harbouring their own spiteful secrets and desires.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Towards the coast, in the east, Dark Elves reside within their dark fortresses harbouring their own spiteful secrets and desires.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A book of the Great Necromancer has been found. Its writings describe spells and incantations of great malignance, yet its power may prove useful to the Mortuary Cult. The search for more books continues.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A book of the Great Necromancer has been found. Its writings describe spells and incantations of great malignance, yet its power may prove useful to the Mortuary Cult. The search for more books continues.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The black walls of Naggarond have repelled many foolish invaders over your reign, sire. Yet this threat must not be taken lightly.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The black walls of Naggarond have repelled many foolish invaders over your reign, sire. Yet this threat must not be taken lightly.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Elf-captives say they want control of Southlands, they seek treasures for their ritual! No, Clan Mors must be first! Hurry, get more Warpstone! Claim Southlands for Queek!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Across the mountains filled with Greenskins and Dwarfs, resides the heart of Nehekhara. Strong bonds could be formed with their Unliving Priest Kings.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Treachery is a way of life for your kin, Warlord Queek. Despite your mighty victories, there remain some within your burrows that would agitate against you. Subdue your Clanrats into obedience, lest they rise up against you.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Treachery is a way of life for your kin, Warlord Queek. Despite your mighty victories, there remain some within your burrows that would agitate against you. Subdue your Clanrats into obedience, lest they rise up against you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy are driven off, my lord! Their plans are thwarted! Victory!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy are driven off, my lord! Their plans are thwarted! Victory!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: What wretches dare intrude and loot my artefacts of power? We must counter-attack at once, before they can draw the power of the Vortex for their own ends. They will pay for their treachery - words of pain shall be spat!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: What wretches dare intrude and loot my artefacts of power? We must counter-attack at once, before they can draw the power of the Vortex for their own ends. They will pay for their treachery - words of pain shall be spat!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Traitors within the Black Court make trouble in your absence, my king. Take steps to re-assert absolute control over your city. Any dissent must be crushed!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Fight elf-things, kill Elf-things! More stuff, more heads, more glory for Queek!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: On the surface, the ratmen were assisted in their attacks by their barbarian allies from the north. These brutes are a frequent hindrance to your dark schemes; the time for their eradication may be at hand.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: On the surface, the ratmen were assisted in their attacks by their barbarian allies from the north. These brutes are a frequent hindrance to your dark schemes; the time for their eradication may be at hand.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Elf-things come from sea fortress. In time we take that-that too. Good base for Queek, maybe-yes!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I, Settra the Imperishable - King of Kings, Lord of the Shifting Sands, Eternal Ruler of Mankind - rest no longer. Nehekhara will be restored to greatness!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I, Settra the Imperishable - King of Kings, Lord of the Shifting Sands, Eternal Ruler of Mankind - rest no longer. Nehekhara will be restored to greatness!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the west are harsh mountains. Although their insides are ripe for burrowing, there are Beastmen that claim this territory too.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the west are harsh mountains. Although their insides are ripe for burrowing, there are Beastmen that claim this territory too.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beware, too, of the living. The warmbloods that dwell in these lands make constant war upon one another, and will be hostile to your cohorts also. Build your strength, then move against them in force.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The fulfilment of a dark prophecy beckons, my subjects. All have felt the unravelling of the Great Vortex by the twin-tailed comet.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet a scent of contagion surrounds its waters. Approach with caution, for such a focus of power will surely have drawn other, more malign forces to its shores.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet a scent of contagion surrounds its waters. Approach with caution, for such a focus of power will surely have drawn other, more malign forces to its shores.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My return shall ensure their agonising deaths, yet the Vortex remains the greater prize. It shall be mine!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your forces have secured the province, my lord. Any contesting claim to this territory has been eliminated. Now that your rule is unquestioned, you may consider issuing a commandment to rouse the populace, so that they may better serve your ends.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: O mighty Kroq-Gar, you find yourself far from home on an expedition to the Southlands. Yet you are not alone, here. Other Lizard-kin may be found nearby, although their interpretation of the Great Plan may differ from yours. I advise caution.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: By gathering way-fragments, scattered across the world during the events of the Sundering, we may gain means to avert the collapse of the Vortex. This search takes us far from home, to the rich jungles of the lizards.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Such a magnificent specimen! I am unworthy to be in your presence, yet I risk my neck and approach you, Warlord Headtaker, for I have many secrets that will bring you success and even greater status.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Druchii - Dark Elves, to the ignorant races - are an insidious threat, Prince Tyrion. Left unchecked, their cunning and malevolence will infiltrate High Elf society to its very core. Take steps to ensure this does not come to pass!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The warmbloods spread themselves throughout our sacred jungle to raid lost treasures for their nefarious masters. They must be driven back, and those plaques they have stolen returned to us.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I must congratulate you, Lord of the Druchii, although your victory was never in doubt. The fate of those taken captive from the battle is now yours to decide.
