onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Move quickly through the land of the living, dark lord. The dead should not linger in untainted country.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Move quickly through the land of the living, dark lord. The dead should not linger in untainted country.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your slaves uncover more chambers and charnel pits, full of long-dead servants that are quickly resurrected. See that the expansion continues, so that you may further develop your realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your slaves uncover more chambers and charnel pits, full of long-dead servants that are quickly resurrected. See that the expansion continues, so that you may further develop your realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though your rapid return brings some welcome additional forces, the situation remains grim. See for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though your rapid return brings some welcome additional forces, the situation remains grim. See for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Great Vortex is vulnerable, and those of dark intent would seek to draw its power for themselves. This cannot come to pass.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Great Vortex is vulnerable, and those of dark intent would seek to draw its power for themselves. This cannot come to pass.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The population of your province grows, my lord. Over time, this growth will permit the expansion of your cities into mighty fortresses of war. See that it continues, so that you may further develop your realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The population of your province grows, my lord. Over time, this growth will permit the expansion of your cities into mighty fortresses of war. See that it continues, so that you may further develop your realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Dark Elf foes have also settled in this continent, my lord, far from their homelands in Naggaroth. Sources indicate that they have located a cache of great power, which they no-doubt intend to direct against the Vortex.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Dark Elf foes have also settled in this continent, my lord, far from their homelands in Naggaroth. Sources indicate that they have located a cache of great power, which they no-doubt intend to direct against the Vortex.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: More treasure-hungry living inhabit these realms; they shall not stand in my way as I march to you, my master. Any artefacts stolen by these mortals will be returned to their rightful home within the Black Pyramid.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: More treasure-hungry living inhabit these realms; they shall not stand in my way as I march to you, my master. Any artefacts stolen by these mortals will be returned to their rightful home within the Black Pyramid.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy recoils before your legions, Great King. End these pests once and for all.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy recoils before your legions, Great King. End these pests once and for all.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your kind thrive on the machinations of statecraft, noble lord. Influence won amongst your peers in the halls of the Asur is a currency like no other, and can be spent on favours both home and abroad.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your kind thrive on the machinations of statecraft, noble lord. Influence won amongst your peers in the halls of the Asur is a currency like no other, and can be spent on favours both home and abroad.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Southlands under attack from Elf-things! Clan Mors sent to-to kill Elf-things and find Warpstone. Warpstone essential!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Southlands under attack from Elf-things! Clan Mors sent to-to kill Elf-things and find Warpstone. Warpstone essential!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elves are scattered, Lord Queek! All of Skavendom shall chitter of your magnificence. It only remains to decide the fate of those captured in battle.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Elves are scattered, Lord Queek! All of Skavendom shall chitter of your magnificence. It only remains to decide the fate of those captured in battle.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The artisans of the Mortuary Cult stand ready to assist your cause, my lord. Employ them to craft powerful artefacts that may aid you in your conquests.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The artisans of the Mortuary Cult stand ready to assist your cause, my lord. Employ them to craft powerful artefacts that may aid you in your conquests.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Just like the Druchii, the vermin are vicious and opportunistic killers. They are doubtless working tirelessly to undermine your fortress.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Just like the Druchii, the vermin are vicious and opportunistic killers. They are doubtless working tirelessly to undermine your fortress.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Clan Rictus find Warpstone best of all! Ritual is ready now, ha-ha! Go-go!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Clan Rictus find Warpstone best of all! Ritual is ready now, ha-ha! Go-go!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Cease your chittering, adherents of decay, for Skrolk speaks! By will-will of Council we set paw in Lustria to visit ruin upon the Reptile-things - yes-yessssss.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Cease your chittering, adherents of decay, for Skrolk speaks! By will-will of Council we set paw in Lustria to visit ruin upon the Reptile-things - yes-yessssss.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Riders from the White Tower report that the ritual is prepared, and Loremaster Talarian stands ready to perform the ceremony. Let us not waste a moment!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Riders from the White Tower report that the ritual is prepared, and Loremaster Talarian stands ready to perform the ceremony. Let us not waste a moment!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Here we may see the state of the province that surrounds your capital. The enemy raids have caused considerable unrest; obedience is suffering as you can see, my lord. The agitators will need suppressing in time, but matters of defence are more urgent.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Here we may see the state of the province that surrounds your capital. The enemy raids have caused considerable unrest; obedience is suffering as you can see, my lord. The agitators will need suppressing in time, but matters of defence are more urgent.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your son has sent you south, away from your traditional stronghold of Ghrond, to reinforce the loyalty of those who defy the Witch King. Destroy or subjugate them, according to your whim.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your son has sent you south, away from your traditional stronghold of Ghrond, to reinforce the loyalty of those who defy the Witch King. Destroy or subjugate them, according to your whim.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Attack, my Lord Mazdamundi! Attack! Drive the barbarous warmbloods from your sacred jungles!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Attack, my Lord Mazdamundi! Attack! Drive the barbarous warmbloods from your sacred jungles!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: One of your subordinates shows questionable devotion to your cause, it would seem. Consider taking steps to appease or otherwise deal with them. Disloyalty cannot be left to fester.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: One of your subordinates shows questionable devotion to your cause, it would seem. Consider taking steps to appease or otherwise deal with them. Disloyalty cannot be left to fester.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Verminous reinforcements may occasionally be summoned from below the battlefield, mighty lord. It is not for nothing that your kind are infamous for the employing the element of surprise in war.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Verminous reinforcements may occasionally be summoned from below the battlefield, mighty lord. It is not for nothing that your kind are infamous for the employing the element of surprise in war.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Find the whereabouts of those that channel the ritual and attack before its completion, my lord. Control of the Vortex must not fall into enemy hands!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Find the whereabouts of those that channel the ritual and attack before its completion, my lord. Control of the Vortex must not fall into enemy hands!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The world trembles before me, for they see that Settra eclipses the Betrayer! Bring me more of his power! Those that stand against me shall perish!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The world trembles before me, for they see that Settra eclipses the Betrayer! Bring me more of his power! Those that stand against me shall perish!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Great Plan of the Old Ones must proceed. Death on those who oppose it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Great Plan of the Old Ones must proceed. Death on those who oppose it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: More godless Orcs dwell in the mountains to the south. But a much greater threat squats within my kingdom. The Necrarch Brotherhood leech upon my realm. A parasite that must be purged.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: More godless Orcs dwell in the mountains to the south. But a much greater threat squats within my kingdom. The Necrarch Brotherhood leech upon my realm. A parasite that must be purged.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: But these, Great King, are but more distractions to a grander plan. The Black Pyramid stands guarded for now by a Sentinel army; control it and claim its dark secrets and with it unimaginable power.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: But these, Great King, are but more distractions to a grander plan. The Black Pyramid stands guarded for now by a Sentinel army; control it and claim its dark secrets and with it unimaginable power.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail Khalida, mighty warrior-queen. Darkness falls upon your kingdom once more.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hail Khalida, mighty warrior-queen. Darkness falls upon your kingdom once more.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The vile sourcery of the Great Betrayer empowers me! Yet more books elude my grasp - redouble your efforts, minions! Do not test my patience further!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The vile sourcery of the Great Betrayer empowers me! Yet more books elude my grasp - redouble your efforts, minions! Do not test my patience further!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A word in your ear: despite the great power you command, the loyalty of your followers cannot always be presumed. Keep a close watch on your subordinates, lord, and be sure to bring those that lack a little faith into line, either through strength or favour.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A word in your ear: despite the great power you command, the loyalty of your followers cannot always be presumed. Keep a close watch on your subordinates, lord, and be sure to bring those that lack a little faith into line, either through strength or favour.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Long have your kind existed in tormented Undeath, mighty lord, prematurely raised by Nagash’s dark sorcery. Rally the Undying legions to your banner and the world can belong to the Tomb Kings once again!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Long have your kind existed in tormented Undeath, mighty lord, prematurely raised by Nagash’s dark sorcery. Rally the Undying legions to your banner and the world can belong to the Tomb Kings once again!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Take-steal Naggaroth and the Vortex for Clan Rictus! Then Council will have seat for Grand Chieftain of the Deep Warrens! Yes-YES!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Take-steal Naggaroth and the Vortex for Clan Rictus! Then Council will have seat for Grand Chieftain of the Deep Warrens! Yes-YES!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yes, master, your benevolent wisdom enriches me! The search for your tomes continues - those who oppose your power shall know only service in Undeath!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yes, master, your benevolent wisdom enriches me! The search for your tomes continues - those who oppose your power shall know only service in Undeath!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Golden Tower is secure, mighty lord. Its misbegotten defenders have fled into the continent's interior. The search for plaques may begin once suitable facilities are constructed. Make haste, for the Vortex diminishes with the passing of time.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Golden Tower is secure, mighty lord. Its misbegotten defenders have fled into the continent's interior. The search for plaques may begin once suitable facilities are constructed. Make haste, for the Vortex diminishes with the passing of time.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings, Craventail. You find yourself deep in the territory of Elf-things, and not the ones that prance about in white robes but their more deviant kin.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Greetings, Craventail. You find yourself deep in the territory of Elf-things, and not the ones that prance about in white robes but their more deviant kin.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Let us review what destruction the Skaven have wrought on your territory, sire. Select your city to inspect the province.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Let us review what destruction the Skaven have wrought on your territory, sire. Select your city to inspect the province.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A wandering host approaches! Beware of such 'rogue armies', my lord - they must not be allowed to threaten your realm. Do not tolerate their incursions on your soil!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A wandering host approaches! Beware of such 'rogue armies', my lord - they must not be allowed to threaten your realm. Do not tolerate their incursions on your soil!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy recoils before your legions. Asaph desires their destruction!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy recoils before your legions. Asaph desires their destruction!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A great and terrible power emanates from the Caverns of Sotek, mighty lord. Much Warpstone must surely be found there, yet it is held by a powerful rival clan.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A great and terrible power emanates from the Caverns of Sotek, mighty lord. Much Warpstone must surely be found there, yet it is held by a powerful rival clan.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You, the Asur of Ulthuan, are guardians of this world, great lord. Your intellects are keen, your warriors highly skilled, and the homelands they defend are like paradise. Truly your noble kind stand at the pinnacle of the world order.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You, the Asur of Ulthuan, are guardians of this world, great lord. Your intellects are keen, your warriors highly skilled, and the homelands they defend are like paradise. Truly your noble kind stand at the pinnacle of the world order.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy have been put to flight, my lord! Victory is yours!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy have been put to flight, my lord! Victory is yours!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Rat-spawn seek territory to uncover more plaques. They must be denied! Ours is the only roar to rule the world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Rat-spawn seek territory to uncover more plaques. They must be denied! Ours is the only roar to rule the world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yes-yes, Warpstone found! Skaven will cast ritual before Elf-things, ha-ha! Let us begin!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yes-yes, Warpstone found! Skaven will cast ritual before Elf-things, ha-ha! Let us begin!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Reptile prisoners say the Lizards retake old jungles, on the lookout for ancient artefact, yes-yes. Plan a ritual they do, same as Skaven, ha-ha! Sotek’s things must not succeed, a plague be upon them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Reptile prisoners say the Lizards retake old jungles, on the lookout for ancient artefact, yes-yes. Plan a ritual they do, same as Skaven, ha-ha! Sotek’s things must not succeed, a plague be upon them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hunt amongst Southlands. Plaques of Old Ones lost – must be found. They shall guide our path.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hunt amongst Southlands. Plaques of Old Ones lost – must be found. They shall guide our path.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The High Elves line up against you in a futile attempt to thwart your destiny, my lord. Annihilate them!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The High Elves line up against you in a futile attempt to thwart your destiny, my lord. Annihilate them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Skaven, my lord! These verminous ratmen are rarely seen above ground. Place no trust in their words and keep their squalid messengers at arm’s length, lest some foul contagion overtake you!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Skaven, my lord! These verminous ratmen are rarely seen above ground. Place no trust in their words and keep their squalid messengers at arm’s length, lest some foul contagion overtake you!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Mighty Settra, greatest of all kings, your civilisation lies in mere ruins of its former glory. Much must be done to restore greatness to your kingdom and for all to fear your wrath once more.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Mighty Settra, greatest of all kings, your civilisation lies in mere ruins of its former glory. Much must be done to restore greatness to your kingdom and for all to fear your wrath once more.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: While the Solar-City itself remains uncompromised, the enemy have rampaged across your wider territory, overrunning several smaller cities near the coast.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: While the Solar-City itself remains uncompromised, the enemy have rampaged across your wider territory, overrunning several smaller cities near the coast.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The 'Elf-things' have launched a full invasion of the Southlands, my verminous lord. Outposts have been established in ancient ruins throughout the province, with any underground entrances magically sealed.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The 'Elf-things' have launched a full invasion of the Southlands, my verminous lord. Outposts have been established in ancient ruins throughout the province, with any underground entrances magically sealed.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: We have all the scrolls we need to commence the ritual. Let us not delay, for Felicion stands ready…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: We have all the scrolls we need to commence the ritual. Let us not delay, for Felicion stands ready…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My hatred cannot be sated any longer! By Asaph, I strike out for vengeance and justice!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My hatred cannot be sated any longer! By Asaph, I strike out for vengeance and justice!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: For now, causing mayhem in the mountains may sate your verminous appetite. There are many heads to take and so little time. Get to it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: For now, causing mayhem in the mountains may sate your verminous appetite. There are many heads to take and so little time. Get to it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Norscans have overrun a number of your monuments in the jungle interior. These are ancient centres of power, and that power cannot be allowed to remain in the hands of such children as the Skeggi!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Norscans have overrun a number of your monuments in the jungle interior. These are ancient centres of power, and that power cannot be allowed to remain in the hands of such children as the Skeggi!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet others of your cold-blooded kind hold them from you, in misguided service to their own masters. When you strike, and strike you must, then war will become inevitable.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet others of your cold-blooded kind hold them from you, in misguided service to their own masters. When you strike, and strike you must, then war will become inevitable.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The power of the Necromancer flows through me! Children of Asaph, find more of his ungodly tomes and bring them to me - his blasphemous wisdom shall be mine!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The power of the Necromancer flows through me! Children of Asaph, find more of his ungodly tomes and bring them to me - his blasphemous wisdom shall be mine!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The power of the Usurper flows within me! Such blasphemous knowledge - I must have more! Cultists, bring it to me!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The power of the Usurper flows within me! Such blasphemous knowledge - I must have more! Cultists, bring it to me!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy have won the field, my lord! Let us retreat while we still can!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy have won the field, my lord! Let us retreat while we still can!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Foul creatures crawl from their catacombs, their bloodline is all that you despise in this world. Rid the Silver Host from Lybaras and put an end to this bitter feud.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Foul creatures crawl from their catacombs, their bloodline is all that you despise in this world. Rid the Silver Host from Lybaras and put an end to this bitter feud.
